review_title: The most exhilarating game for VR yet!
one_reviews_text: It's super fast paced and incredibly fun.  It's the game I use to show other people the fun of Oculus.  You'll work up a sweat blasting robots away.  The motion of reaching behind your head to grab your shotgun is brilliant, and makes it that much more realistic.

Robo recall is briliant.. It's an arcade shooter with a loose storyline that gives you all the excuse you need to start literally tearing robots in half and blowing them all sky high. The teleport system is an example of locomotion done right. Just imagine the old Time Crisis arcade games, but with you actually inisde the world. Controls work great, the game looks fabulous, and it all flows really well. And in true arcade style there's plenty of ways to boost your score (try throwing robots at each other, or juggling them in the air with a round of bullets). If you want a VR arcade shooter then this is where you need to begin.
This is a fun game with enjoyable enviroments. can get a little boring after a while and I wish there was smooth locomotion, but still a good addition to your VR library.
This definitly in my top 5 all time VR games, super fun. you will want to play it through many times, and show it to all your mates.

great all around game+8
while playing a robo boy touched my dingy -5
was eating chips while playing cuz i was on a break cuz rat was diagnosed with mesoththelioma and i was entitled to financial compensation so i was thinking about that but even thiugh i told the robot to not kill me for a sec but he did so -1

This was free with my Oculus Rift and I was surprised it was, I definitely would have paid for this game with no problems at all. 

This is the perfect game to showcase VR, it is so much fun.

Sweet. Blasting robots with a pair of automatics like a hero from a John Woo movie couldn't be more exlilirating. Just not a fan of the whole teleporting thing otherwise I would give this game another star. Throw in some locomotion as an option for this game in the next update, and I'm sold.

(December 22 2018) SOLD! Oculus was cool enough to provide a mod that, whewn installed into the game, allows you to roam freely in complete locomotion! Robo Recall, you've got your extra star!

this game includes shooting bots in the face, This game includes shooting bots in the face, tearing their arms off, and practicing your first-person shooting. But this games can get really hard sometimes. (my dad can't beat me.)

I can't believe this was given to Oculus owners for free.  The game is an amazing shooter.  Juggle enemies in the air with your pistols, rip off a robot head and chuck it at another robot, grab bullets and rockets out of the air and throw them back at the shooter.  I hate teleporting in VR games but I make an exception for this game because it works so well and has a purpose (it slows things down when you teleport).  Only complaint (besides no locomotion) is that the game is short with only 3 levels.  The game does support mods but the community is tiny.  Was hoping there would be additional maps.  

I would gladly pay for Robo Recall 2.

This is an excellent game! Movement, actions, and guns work awesome. Game runs smooth with no lag or dropped frames. The music sound track rocks!!! I think other VR game makers should use this as their base line for creating. Out of the games that I have paid for, I keep coming back to play Robo Recall which Oculus gave to me for free!
good graphics and loving the game play, doging and catching bullets and ripping up robots.

the weapon feeling is great and the possibilitys to kill the bots are vast and funny.
There are only 3 level but that's not a problem because you only need a sandbox to have fun. Espacially for all the people that got it free Robo Recall is a super game.
PS: The soundtrack is awesome
Best game ever.... you'll love it

review_title: The best FPS I've ever played
one_reviews_text:
Seriously, no other FPS has been able to match up, and it's the perfect VR experience.

I saw some people complaining about it crashing, I have not had that experience at all. The whole thing has run really smoothly. AAA with AAA graphics and gameplay

This game needs an expansion! Or Multiplayer/Co-op! Something! Keep this franchise going cause it's amazing!!
AWESOME!@
I just have to use one sentence to express my feelings. Best VR game created.

Seriously. I purhcased Oculus for more intensive simulation experience (Elite Dangerous to be precise) and was 100% sure about that I won't be playing any shooters on rails. But since this game is in bundle I gave it a shot.
That was a looong shot!
This game works very good, smooth and nice graphics, intense gameplay but not kicking your head, music is fantastic yet does not comes at the top. Lot of guns and you can use your fists, you can grab an reap apart enemies. It's like Doom but with robots and much less gore and more fun and comedy focused.
When I have my "VR time" I allways want to play at least one or two missions in Robo Recall.
AWESOME game!

The combat is fun, the story is fun, the movement is fun, etc. This game just feels very well refined and professional, unlike many other VR games. Everything works well and smoothly and the only complaint I have is that there it is too short to fully appreciate how amazing it is!
This was an amazing experience. I had so much fun playing this game and yet no other has beaten this for me. I want more! I want RoboRecall2 !
excellent action packed game

But be aware of your furniture and pc though :->

5 stars = 4 stars with the best graphics 
4 stars = definitely a realy good investment, will spent a lot of time with it
3 stars = works perfectly, would probably even give some money for it
2 stars =good enough to keep it installed and open it from time to time, wouldn't buy it (again)
1 star = wouldn't buy or install it again but did try / didn't work properly
Amazing experience!
My first VR shooter I ever tried.. really spoiled me. Well polished game, superb gunplay. It achieves it's goal with flying colors. (Also the soundtrack is phenomenal)
Nice graphics, fun robots, cool abilities and weapons to make it look like as if youre playing superhot vr in real time. However, the levels are rather repetitive and the game length is rather short.

playing on my AMD ryzen OC 1400 and msi RX580 4GB 16gb ddr4 ram settings Maxed out and smooth fluid gameplay. This game can make you sweat its that intense as you'll be moving around a lot even if seated. This was included free with latest touch bundle but I would have paid for it thats for sure. One of the few shooters that allows for easy teleporting, reload, and great aiming mechanics. Give this one a try as you'll know whether or not its worth it within the first 15min of playing

review_title: The reason to own VR is this game
one_reviews_text: This game is fantastic in terms of graphics, immersion, and gameplay. It is by far the BEST example VR First Person Shooter I have played thus far and the teleport system prevents motion sickness. Highly recommend this to anyone looking to see what VR is all about. This game alone for me is worth the cost of the oculus rift. I am playing it on a i7-8th gen 1070 gtx alienware laptop and performance is flawless maxed out.

review_title: One of the best VR games!
one_reviews_text: This game deserves to be praised.
This game is well done. Gives me hope for the future of VR. Would love to see additional content for this game.
Whats not to like. Too short. Yet replayable as Fck

review_title: Sets bar high for other games
one_reviews_text: Graphics, Game play, narration/voice, moving around, sound everything is great.

People that get motion sickness need transporter movement like people that can't walk need wheelchairs but not everyone needs transporter movement!! What if you went to a store in RL and at the door they told you that you have to use a wheelchair bec some people need it to move around. THAT is what games with transporter movement as the only option are like to me! Pls check out VRchat on steam (free) to see what good movement options are like!! I would love this game IF it had "smooth motion, joystick movement" mode. It's just too much of a disorenating mess without it. Please fix and note in "Aditional details" that it has "Multiple movement modes". As long as transporter movement is still avaliable AND default before changing, it can keep its comfort rating!!!
My game has been installing this update for the past two days straight. What do i do?

I just got an Oculus about a week ago.  But I had been planning to buy one for a while and knew I needed a powerful computer.  So I built an amazing computer towards the end of last year.  I finally got the Oculus and it came with this game.  Wow, this game is not only very impressive, but its also very fun.  I've played several games over the last few weeks.  Some were not built as VR originally, but it has been cobbled together.  They work, but the controls are not fluid.  In this game though, everything is fluid.  It is clear it was built from the ground up as a VR game.  It takes a little getting used to the teleport function.  But once you have that under control, this game is non stop.  The commentary is amusing.  The graphics are great.  And the VR is exceptional.  I've already completed all levels, but will continue playing to unlock more weaponry.  Honestly, its a great cardio work out too.  You get pretty sweaty playing it.
Its fun and you move around alot so i guess thats good for your health or something like that i dont know im not a doctor but its really fun and thats what i know for sure
Good
So much fun. This is the first game i've played in VR and it has been a great first impression.
You will soon learn its a shooting game that doesnt require guns
Another One must have for oculus.
Get ready for a fast paced experience!
Super fun and came for free, what can I say?
great game. i wish it has some sort of multiplayer.

I have played many VR games in the past and this game by far has over ruled them by a lot but can you please add more levels it would be a lot better if there were more leveles. I will also say that it doesnt take that much of a computer to run this when i first played i used my computer that has 16 gigs and 1070 with a i5 7400, then i tried it with my other computer with 8 gigs and 1050Ti with a i5 7400 and it ran fine
By far the most fun VR game I've played.

Worst thing I can say about this game is the occasional crash (could be my drivers) and it's kind of short.

There's replayability though in the form of achievements for each level. Love it!
PLAIN GREAT
What can I say Epic Games makes the best games.

I honestly love this game to death. I can work out playing it, i can blow off a robot's faces. And i've been designated ruler of the universe!

also theres a hidden pump on the bottom of the shotgun that can let you discharge all 3 barrels at once!
Great physics, great soundtrack, great shooting, awesome gameplay.. Is there any more too say? One of the best Rift games so far, a must have for every Rift owner! This game completely blew me away!

review_title: The new standard for VR shooters
one_reviews_text: This is a terrific game, which most other companies should model their products on going forward. Smooth and addicting gameplay, very fun and intense. It's on the shorter side, but setup where there's replayability if you want to achieve higher scores and unlocks. Every reason to give this one a try.
Absolutly fantastic game.

This was the game that got me to buy the Oculus Rift after trying a demo of it instore. Lots of fun, challenging and a pefect use of Oculus Touch. If you have a 3rd sensor then the 360 gameplay adds to the game nicely - I find myself facing a different direction that what I started in when I finish a game. It's not necessary though as the game is designed for front facing play. Get it if you like fun style shoot 'em ups

So much fun, supports mods and a good workout. Why go to the gym to get fit, when you can fight robots at home in your underpants?  The robots being full size are quite surreal and the materials/shaders used provide remarkably realistic visuals. A high quality game that demonstrates perfectly both VR and the natural effectiveness of touch controllers. An essential for anyones library.

I get it, the graphics and gameplay is fantastic but I still can't bring myself to love it. Huge a** robots with evil faces charging towards you or creeping up behind you wanting to kill you. It's just a little too terrifying for me. The developers tried to make it "less hostile" by giving them an absurd comical voice but it ends up making the whole situation rather weird and uncomfortable for my brain to comprehen. Moving around by teleporting just isn't right or intuitive. You end up losing your bearings especially when things get heated up it just causes a lot of confusion. For me I think the only way to enjoy this game is to ignore all natural instinct to comprehen your enviroment/situation and just shoot like a mad man. The scenes are beautiful and I wish I could explore it but the teleportation method of moving around plus the constant fear of evil robots trying to kill you just destroys the experience! I'm glad this game came free otherwise I would have regretted my purchase. I'm sorry I had to give it 3-stars, it's just my personal opinion. Am I the only one feeling this way?
Enjoyed the 1st stage. I'm recommending this to all of my friends!

This game really nails the arcade feel for a shoot 'em up game, even the title screen's "ROOOOBOOOO RECAAAALLLL!" sounds like I could hear it coming out of an old cabinet as I walked by begging for my quarters. Really a great VR experience, it felt like I was dropped into a classic arcade setting.
Fun game with lots of action and nice game feel. A must!

Reviewed on Vive: Tremendous fun. Beat the game within a couple of hours and then spend hours perfecting the levels and getting perfect scores. More More More. Some minor frustrations cross platform using revive. Vive handles turning better, so there should be an option to disable trackpad turning, also, teleport is a little fiddly. Walk/ run mode without teleport would have been better.
This is a really fun game, but keeps crashing in the middle of it.
This game is very fun because you get to kill a bunch of crazy robots with some pretty cool weapons, but when one of those suckers comes up behind you it will make your heart stop and your poop drop.
its a really fun game but for some reason only 1 out of like 30 tries to access the game it will work. fun but never loads

This is the first game I show anyone trying out VR, and it does not disapoint.  It is miles ahead of most shooters out there for single player, and is loads of fun.  The only negatives I can see is that it has no multiplayer, and after your beat it, you probably only return to it once or twice a month.
I have a problem with the gun not matching my positioning and it all becomes very disjointed..using a Razor. Is that the problem?
A great shooter.  Watch out for the spider robots, you'll be freaked out as they jump towards you.  Great fun.

This game is truly immersive and great graphics.
Just 1 epic game to play. all looks so nice, happy to have it for free in my collection with touch controllers.

This game is really hard to beat. I'm so glad it's free so that everyone gets to enjoy it and get them truely interested in VR. Controls couldn't be better, creative interactions with AI, and infinite replayability.

Played the first couple of missions and I loved it. Experienced some stuttering during explosions that happened right next to my face, but I assume that's a result from my supersampling greed.

All in all a great game and I'm really glad that it's included with the move controller purchase.

From the intro you can tell this game has plenty of tongue in cheek humor and it spills over with cheesy dialogue the whole way, fitting the theme well. The single most well polished and entertaining game in my growing library, I love playing Robo Recall. When you first start playing you can feel a bit overwhelmed, but once you're comfortable with teleporting around, grabbing enemies, throwing weapons for a reload, catching and throwing back bullets, and so many other cool features, you really start to feel like you've got some serious talent! 
The game runs very smoothly and does a fantastic job in really immersing you. My only real complaint is not noticing enemies from behind when they sometimes walk through the player, which sends you jumping.

I will admit, the story of this game is a little thin, but that's not the point! Ripping off robots' heads is by far the best way to lose post-exam stress. I was so happy when I saw this game came with my Oculus bundle, but I would still recommend as one of the first thing any new Oculus owner should buy
Super Fun experience, robots cool :)
you have to play robo recall it is the best game ever

I played an hour and thought I'd give a refund. but i still have this game
i have very very low computer i5 3570 gtx960 but this game work so faster
no lagging no bugs and perfect teleport system 
dude just buy .

너무좋았다 그냥 사.

This is what a VR game should be. You can feel the energy flowing in you when playing. The first time i felt an awesome adrenaline rush. I hope we see a second game. Epic games really got the hang of this.

If you don't have this game and love it, then you need to take a long hard look at your Oculus and then return it to the store because VR is clearly not for you. This game is the perfect VR shooter. Only trouble is it's short. Still the most fluid shooter on the market. Best part is teleporting right behind two enemies, grabbing them, and them smashing them together till they break. Total bad*** moment Number One.

review_title: Cool but  a little laggy for some reason
one_reviews_text: This game is almost perfect except for some reason it keeps on lagging for me event tho i have a gtx 1060 and intel i7

Really fun ! you can do the same mission 20 times and you can do it in 20 different ways !!!
Must have ! A multiplayer would have been great !

review_title: Destroying Robots has never been so fun
one_reviews_text: Robo Recall is the game that forced me to buy a Rift. Played it for 10 minutes via my brother in law and had no other option than to run out to best buy and dive on one of these. This is mandatory for any rift collection. On par with Lone Echo in terms of this is what other developers should be aiming for, in terms of quality.

review_title: First game i played in VR
one_reviews_text: FIrst and still one of the most fun titles i have.
My girlfriend and I just got the Rift this last weekend and have already put in a few hours into this game.

awsome amazing now for robo recall 2 add LOCOMOTION and it will be INSANELY AMAZING they have it for this one but its not offical it has bugs so if epic games puts it in that would be great it will be PERFECT.

Considering that the Oculus Rift + Touch Controller bundle costs approximately $400, this is one hell of a bonus to throw in. Most hardware is purchased with the assumption of additional funds being required to truly enjoy the new investment. Robo Recall truly solidifed my resolve in my purchasing decision, with the very well optimized combat, funny (and intentionally dated at times) humor, all the way to the quite frankly brilliant movement system that encourages the player to play to the Oculus' strengths and downplay its weakpoints (with a two-sensor setup primarily). I cannot suggest a better game to people who just purchased their Oculus, this game is some of the most fun I have had with a new title in quite some time.
Everything about this game feels right. Very immersive, action-oriented, amazing replayability. I wish there would be DLCs.

This is a very fun game. I really enjoyed it but I felt as much as I played a game that was repetitive except for the boss that they were very fun and in order to upgrade the weapons you have to get as many points as possible and it is encouraging to get a lot of points in the game. I think it's a good game but it has a place to improve.
i see a lot of people complaining about the lenght of the game. I think that if you  would add a multiplayer to the game, it would elevate the bar by far bringing many people and attention.

I REALLY want to like this game! It got style and lots of satirical 80's-humor. The handling of the guns is great it's just fun to rip the robos apart, but there is this one common, giant, unbearable weakness: THE TELEPORT-NAVIGATION!!! It ruins the whole experience!

This is one of the best VR games you can play, i enjoyed every minute of it. I would love to see more content. Trying to 100% this game will be tough :)
Devs.....GREAT JOB!!!
This game is so much fun to play! It's extremely entertaining, the commentary from the environment is hilarious and the missions are dynamic. Completely recommend.

review_title: The best VR Game I have ever played
one_reviews_text:
This game is fun and action packed.
If you enjoyed superhot, you will like this.
The controls are amazing and more games should use this style of movement.
It only has 9 levels, but its free and amazing. There is a lot of replayablilty.
Won't load nothing but a black screen then terminates waste of time downloading

Best game so far!!! 
and it is free... i only wish it is longer.
The game is fun to play, the shooting is awsome it is a 5 star game!
if i were asked to pay for more content i will pay
no more to say. Full of action and movement is getting rewarded. That's what a VR-Sports-Shooter have to be like

review_title: Robo Recall is the VR apex
one_reviews_text:
This is what a VR Game should be.

Transitioning between melee, matrix bullet time, and ranged weaponry is seamless, fluid, and frankly it makes you feel like a bad***.

I bought the Oculus rift the summer of last year and Robo Recall still came free at that time. This is one of the best titles that you can get free or pay for. If this is a prelude of VR, I can't wait to see what's to come. Please OCULUS, Don't fall behind. I think oculus is staple and stepping stone to VR. I never had an issue with the game as others are complaining.

review_title: Can we PLEASE FIX THIS GAME!!!
one_reviews_text: Nearly 75% of the people who play this game cant play past a certain level... more than 50% of the levels are bugged and wont let you play. I actually waited for updates and fixes to occur in the past month and NOTHING!!!!! this is ridiculous how can a game have so many bad reviews vs good reviews and still they do nothing about this issue. ITS THE SAME ISSUE EVERYONES HAVING... smh!

review_title: The best Welcome to VR experience.
one_reviews_text: This should be the bar setter for VR. Runs perfect, looks awesome and has a lot of interaction. This is a VR experience.

Not much to say really, I've had this game for almost a year and despite having finished everything on it I still log on every other day for a quick 10-15 min fix of  awesomeness.

Simply the best Oculus has to offer as far as gameplay goes, I would gladly pay for some more content. Even so, just hoping into a game and feeling like you're in a choreographed action movie, maybe even with some music playlist in the background, is well worth it.
fun, funny, fantastic looking game.
the best game ive played but is there a way to get more maps??
After playing this game at a friend's. I built a new game sysem and bought an Oculus just for this game alone.
By far the most fun I've had in a VR game. I have yet to play anything else this awesome!

review_title: This game sold me on Vr.
one_reviews_text: Easily the best Vr game on the market that I have seen or played. A must buy.
One of the best VR experiances polished to perfection and still great to play in late 2019

This game is LOADS of fun. Deflect and dodge bullets mid-flight, grab missiles out of the air and turn them to your advantage, rip enemies apart with your bare hands, punch, pistol whip, and smash your way through beautifully-created environments like Doom guy, all with amusing Portal-esque dialogue! 11/10, would accidentally punch fan again. And desk. And bed.

One of the best! It's already a classic.
We need more games like this! Great gameplay !
By far one of the best vr shooters out there (if not #1 already). Its a must try game.
Seriously, you got the game with your rift and it is one of the best VR experiences. Play it.
DX11 feature level 10.0 is required to run this engine
seriously have some cheese nuggets

review_title: Yeah, It's the best shooter by a mile.
one_reviews_text: Massive budget and dedication made this game. I love the Time Crisis arcade vibe. Best shooting mechanics on VR. One of the prettiest games too. Just the best.

review_title: One of the best games I've ever played
one_reviews_text: Amazing graphics and optimization. Good music and full of action. Dozens of ways to restroy the robots which are very well made and satisfying to kill. Lot of enemy variety and weapon customization. You will feel all powerful like Neo. One of the best VR games out there (if not the best). After playing this you just want more levels to play and more robots to kill!

review_title: Best wave shooter and it's free!
one_reviews_text: Best wave shooter out ther and it's free!

Game was included with Oculus purchase.  First VR game I've ever played and I could see what the fuss was all about with VR.  It is immersive and intense. As I played other VR games I experienced motion sickness, but this game does not cause any motion sickeness.
Best VR game I've played so far.

Free with Oculus? I'd pay £40 for this easily!
I can't get enough of this game.  From that first moment you're standing in the middle of the robots while they turn on you (I got a sinking feeling in my stomach when that happened) to the last boss fight then over and over again to get those stars, I've had a blast, it's no wonder it's had so many awards and nominations, well done!
I almost got 100% when I had to reinstall Windows and it wiped all my progress...had to start again...NO PROBLEMS HERE, I enjoy playing this so much it was better playing through it a second time, now only to get 100%!

It is over in less than a day, there is no depth and no online community.

TRIED LOOKING UP MODS, THERE ARE NONE!

I never play this after first getting Rift, it is very unfinished and there is no story. 

How to do the mods?
Best VR game so far.

This game is the reason I bought the Rift , to get this free with the Rift bundle felt like a criminal offense Lol. 
The Game is a must have , brilliant fun sci-fi shooter with loads of replay value.
Leaderboards add an extra incentive to better your score on each level.
Simply Brilliant.

Best shooter and mechanics for VR to date. After playing this and trying out other shooters nothing comes close. Grab a robot and rip it's leg off and beat it to death. Grab another and use it as a robo shield then toss it at its buddies.
One of the first games I tried and it's still my favorite. Truly captures that 1980's hi-tech arcade shooter feel.

review_title: Lots of fun, easy to master
one_reviews_text: Make movements often, be aware you can climb ontop of cars or ledges, and aim for the head!

Like most people, i got this free with touch and it's incredible. Although the short play time it has so much potential, personally it would be cool if they added in a wave system. Endless robots, spider things and other stuff I have no idea of. Anyway if you haven't played it, well what are you waiting for?

review_title: One of the best action VR titles!
one_reviews_text: This game is a near-perfect action VR title. I have tried many games out (including top dollar VR games) and this still sits on top as one of the best all-time VR games. Plenty of replay value with leaderboards and achievements.
This is the only VR Game I have finished and I have the Rift for more than one year. It's super effective !
this is what a VR game should look like period

review_title: Had to beat it the day I tried it
one_reviews_text: Simply could not put it down. Robo Recall does so much right that it is sometimes painful to try and play other shooting games. Also has mod support which is an amazing feature that will hopefully lead to more content created in future as VR decreases in costs and enters mainstream markets.
I broke the ceiling at my grandparents place, cus i was jumping around, throwing and punching stuff :D I hope more same or higher quality games appear in store soon!

I'm blown away with how well this game plays.  It's fairly short, but everything in here is polished and enjoyable.  Particularly impressed with the functional weapon sights - it's the little details like this that really surprised me.

review_title: Glad they hand this out for free
one_reviews_text: I don't know anyother game that allows you to use an enemies head as a weapon and his body as a shield/another weapon. Playing it you feel like a god, seeing someone play it they look like they're having a seizure.
Finished in a few days...  Plenty of action.  More EGO than motion, teleport?  why can't I just walk there??? Not multiplayer.  No Social Network.
this game was just brilliant because it actually had a campaign compared to the last one "bullet train" and the ending was terrific so i would deffenitly give this a 5 star.

This was the first game I played in VR and it really set the bar for what I expect from other shooters.

The aim is very smooth and feels acurate.  The environments are great.  The movement is smooth and intuitive.  This game is outstanding.  There is a good amount of content - perhaps there could be more but I certainly am not complaining.

Just great, so glad it came with my Touch, interaction is awesome, al the small details of interaction is cool. How you guys made  a use for teleport with the mobs is awesome, teleporting behind enemies in a flash makes me feel like an X-Men with teleport capabilities, now i feel like Mightcrawler coming behind is enemies and unarming them, or leaping behings robots wiht huge shields, wasn'T sure about teleporting at first, but got to say, developement teams that finds a way to use the teleporting like this  make sme like it, doesn't get me more immertion to walk around by moving my thumbstick while being in VR, since my legs aren't moving more than when i teleport. :) Just makes me feel like moving around a wheel chair, so, i don't mind teleporting. Run super smooth on all high setting son my old i7-2600k Stock 3.4 ghz, EVGA GTX 1070sc 8g, 16 g ram on Win 10, nothing i can ask more. A good reference game to show the potential of VR at friends coming home to try out VR. Good Job. Oh yeah one bad comments only, for some reason it's the only game when i get into the beat, ltos of freaking time i accidently get into pause menu, annoying, gotta see what i am doing wrong. :)

review_title: The Best Shooter available in VR! but ..
one_reviews_text:
This is a fantastic game, gorgeous visuals, great artstyle and sense of humour. Excellent immersive VR and the teleport movement is basically a standard that should spread across all similar FPS games.

But ...

We need more content, It's good for a good few hours and a lot of it is repeatable but still. I get that it was free with Oculus touch but im sure if Epic put out some paid DLC 95% of the player base would snap it up in an instant. I know i would.

All in all, a fantastic game. We just need and want more!

review_title: My most favorite VR game to date!
one_reviews_text:
Robo Recall has actually drived more VR fans. 
My hats off to everyone involved in this project! Thank you so much Epic Games for an epic title.

review_title: Hate to be one of the herd, but...
one_reviews_text:
One of, if not the best games out there for the rift. Amazing graphics, even on my bog standard 970, shows what can be achieved, using the UE, without requiring a beast of a pc. Great gameplay, really immersive - of you go for a lot of 'hand to hand', then expect to get a little damp.
But seriously folks, who can't help but to love a game which lets you beat a robot to death with its own arm (or leg)? And that's just one of a shedload of ways to skin a dead cat herein.

If you haven't yet, then do - this really is a game as good as its reviews, and then some.

review_title: One of the top VR games. Must Play!

review_title: First VR title and I love it!
one_reviews_text: Haven't played much of this yet but so far I'm loving every bit of it! You really feel like you are there and have control. Ripping arms and legs of the robots is satisfying and you can use them as shields and so on. This is just a 10/10 experience. Super fun and intense!

review_title: I wish this game had a multiplayer mode.
one_reviews_text: Fun concept, it just got repetitive after a while. It needs more game modes.

An incredible and satisfying game! The controls are smooth and intuitive, the gameplay is challenging and has a surprising amount of depth. The way you can interact with the robots (ripping off heads, using them as shields, throwing them into each other) turns this from a simple shooter into a rich and complex combat experience. The wonderful graphics and audio are icing on the cake. A well thought out and executed experience from start to finish.

While there are plenty of amazing games out for VR, Robo Recall is at a different level - it feels like a true AAA compared to indie games. 

The attention to detail is one of the aspects that sets it apart from other games. While it's a shooter, it allows you to do just about anything you want in terms of destroying robots. Shooting? Of course. Grabbing a bullet that's been shot at you and tossing it back? Yep. Grabbing an opponent and throwing them at another opponent? Sure, with unique effects based on what type of opponent you grabbed. Ripping a robot's arm off and beating it with it? Naturally. Throwing a gun at an enemy when you run out of bullets? Yep, and it reloads the gun which then bounces back for you to catch.

As far as "badass factor" goes, Robo Recall is far and away the best game to date.

review_title: Best Shooter Game For VR So Far!
one_reviews_text:
I think that this game is amazing, but I understand that some people might have questions about the game so I'll use bullet points to keep things brief.

Pros:

*Amazing graphics
*Consistent gun shooter system
*No gore
*Mod compatibility
*HTC Vive compatibility(with Revive)
*Challenging Boss battle system
*Accurate throwing motions( a lot of games need that)
*Great controller haptic advantages
*The game is free for purchase

Cons: 

*Only a few in-game levels
*No active movement(Example:Sairento Vr has A LOT of active movement)
*No locomotion options
*Little enemy diversity

Conclusion: Overall, I think that this game needs a couple tweaks here and there, but other than that I'll give this the honor of being the BEST shooter on the Oculus Store.

review_title: Fun, but not very well done.
one_reviews_text: Robo Recall is very fun to play, and the graphics are gorgeous. But two things bring it down. First, the teleportation system is totally messed up : the arrow which appears during the teleportation process is NOT the direction you are looking at (because it is the direction between you and your sensors). This isn't a problem as long as you face your sensors... but in VR, you turn around! Basically, whenever you move, you can move the direction of the arrow (so basically you change the orientation of the VR world around you, relatively to the real world). So you teleport, and the world changed its orientation, but not you. This is really disorienting, and thus, unusable. For example : you want to teleport in front of a robot. What do you do? You try to teleport in front of it, and you turn the arrow so that it faces the robot (that's the instinct choice). BUT the arrow is not actually the direction you're looking at! So instead of winding up facing the robot, you'll wind up facing on its left, or even in the opposite direction... The second problem is : the game is not optimized. The worst is, the program doesn't clean its data during a mission. When you start the mission, it's fine, the game is smooth. But the longer you play the mission, the more data, and as the game keeps all of it, the more power it needs. In the end, you wind up with a huge drop in framerate, and that's absolutely awful. Because of those two problems, I can't give it a good mark. But it is really fun, so I still advise to try the game! If you want a fun FPS, there are plenty others, who won't have the technical problems Robo Recall has.
review_feedback: Hi, LuluViBritannia. If you go into the Robo Recall in-game menu to "Settings" and select "Tracking Options" there's a setting called "360 Tracking" and "Use Teleport Direction" that will allow the directional arrow to match your facing direction. This will address your first concern. Regarding your performance loss, can you provide more details? We've not see this drop off in any of our testing and have optimized the game to run at the Oculus recommended min-spec. There are graphic settings that can be adjusted for certain systems if needed. Please email me at tommy.jacob@epicgames.com.

First things first: highly recommended for fans of shooter games. The whole product is well put together, great graphics, good storyline, immersive gameplay... list goes on.
BUT front-facing mode doesn't do it justice. You really need roomscale to be immersed in it, wouldn't recommend stationary. Also hipfire and quick shots without reticle aiming is a bit off compared to real guns: In my opinion the Oculus touch controllers, while leaps ahead of the other VR controllers, lack the correct allignment of pistol grips to be truly accurate long range. The feel of the grip's angle isn't a 100%. It shows when you're taking even 20-meter shots at a moving target, I find that without a conscious correction my shots go a few degrees above the intended point. A pet peeve maybe but this game is fast pace enough for it to matter. I'd like to see some sort of aiming option for manual reallignment.
All and all a great game and highly recommended.

I see a lots of 5 stars, not sure if they are for the gorgeous environments and overall graphic, because the game itself is a good game but not a 10 out of 10 for sure.
You walk around with teleport; which is something that I don't like, especially when you are facing enemies coming all the way around you; it is fundamentally a FPS in waves, and having freedom of movement would have been better, but I understand that people get sick when moving around in VR, so kudos for making the game accessible.
Aiming is a bit off; projectiles for some reasons have mass; and gravity seems to be 5x the usual 9.8m/s on Earth; which result in bullets going down if you aim straight where you should. VR is fun because it is like handling a real item; but this means that you need to pay more attention to how an item works and react, otherwise you break the immersion. For a casual user, the shooting is fun, and 1 star goes just for the fact that you can throw back bullets or dismantle robots that get too close. Fun game to play, it is in the top 5 games for VR so far, and well done.
...of the last years and one of the best VR experiences. YOU MUST PLAY THIS GAME!!
Free and guns. Very fun shooting game and will be addicted for a while haha.
free, long play, upgrade, destruction...YEAH
This game is insane! Its kind of short but by far the best VR experience so far!
Great graphics, great gameplay, great humor, great great great
By far the most immersive VR game out there, could play for hours!

Really cool game, the sensations are here and it's really fun catching those bullets and sending back to the senders or teleporting behing a robot and rip it apart.

I would recommend a 360 setup though, it is way more immersive and fun to play. It also makes the teleportation system less confusing.

I would've liked some more variations in ememies and mostly environment but it's alright, especially since the replay value is really high.
Excellent VR game experience!

It's the first game that I make someone play when they use my Rift for the very first time. It's the best introduction to VR for anyone. 
I hope for new content and for multiplayer anytime soon. I really want to play this game with my friends even if it is versus AI or versus other Players.
It's amazing!
Great graphics, nice shooting and awesome evil robots. But then I couldn't play anymore, the game crashes at start. Even installed everything fresh including Windows. Otherwise 5 stars.
Awesome game, if I didn't get it for free with the Oculus touch bundle I def. would have bought it.
Much WOW! Fun fun fun! The biggest downside is that the campaign is pretty short, but the game itself is rather amazing.
WOW !  Nothing Else !

When I was a kid I used to punch air pretending to kick *ss of some imaginary enemies. This game brings me the same feeling of awesomeness!
good game

best game so far for free

this is the best VR game ever.
should get it
I've had oculus for a week, this is one of the best games i've tried

This is another game which justifies your Oculus purchase. Great graphics and Touch controls. Excellent game to show off your Oculus to friends. Punched a bad dude with another bad dude's arm: 10 / 10.
Graphics are 10/10. Interaction, shooting is great fun.

Can't say enough good things about this FPS / comedy / thriller. The combat can be intense as you strive to survive and "recall" as many robots as possible. The action is fast. The music is great and the commentary (both from the robots and the announcer) is hilarious.   It is so immersive that you lose your bearings at times (I'm often facing 90% away from my original starting position).

A truly awesome game.  :-)

Enjoy!
Exactly what VR is supposed to be.

review_title: My first and favorite game for VR
one_reviews_text: This game is so much fun. There are many different ways to reclaim the robots, which keeps the limited number of levels from being monotonous and plain. Progression of weapon attachments bring an exponential component in to how you recall. Dialogue is hilarious. Props to whoever wrote the script.

First game I got free from offer.
Absolutely great!
NICE
Game stopped working apon launch everytime , never started yet !
Really good product
Want a quick, fun, funny arcade experience? Get it. Plus c'mon, it's free with touch. Play the game. Do the thing.

review_title: My absolute favorite game on rift
one_reviews_text: Very polished.  Great for beginners to Rift. Campagin has good replay value to complete challenges.  Upgradeable guns.  Only wish there were more levels.
One of the best games I've played in years. Its mechanics are simple and it's just plain fun. Replay value is high. Enjoy it.

I could only play it once, and i could not launch it again, sad thing is that ive only played for about 13 minutes, for the time that i have played it, it was fun, except that i could not launch it again

review_title: Great game with a few errors
one_reviews_text: A good game with outstanding grapics, good gameplay with a few problems. For a start, it ends quite abruptly and isn't as long as I would've liked it to be. One or two hours of story, and then it's just replaying the same levels to beat your score. Not a very wide selection of guns to choose from, and I wouldn't say all of the guns are perfect. For one, with the "fully automatic lazer rifle", it is very hard to aim as you use only one hand to hold it. I feel that seeing as the whole point of this game is for it to be a shooter game where you shoot things with guns, they should make the shotgun and the lazer rifle be grippable with two hands. For another, the levels are a bit too long. By the end of one or two levels I will have already broken a sweat and have achey eyes and have to have a 15 minute break. However, if you are good at jumping around and shooting robots for half an hour or so with one-handed guns, then go ahead, this game is for you. I personally love the game, just wanted a two-handed grip mechanic and some more gameplay - but who knows, maybe they're making more levels as you read this.

Robo Recall is a brilliant demonstration of how to implement VR FPS. The gun-play is exceptional and enemy interaction with weapon and melee is very well done and impressive.

The only two major flaws is the lenght of the game, you think you've just gotten to the first boss of the first chapter/area, but it turns out to be the final boss... Not sure if there is even more then an hour or two of gameplay if you're an experienced FPS player. (Although the game has great replay value.)

The locomotion "teleporting" system can be a fun addition to the combat at times, but mostly its just really really annoying and dosen't work well at all for sitting down and playing. The game NEEDED to have the OPTION to use the joysticks on the touch controllers to ADJUST movement and orientation. This is a huge fail and takes away so much from what otherwise is the most impressive VR tech-demo out there.

Despite the shortcomings I give the game 4/5 since it was included for free with the touch controllers and is overall very very well crafted.

review_title: THIS is VR as it should be.
one_reviews_text: This game is amazingly polished. Well what else would you expect from Epic Games? :D The overall Quality is perfect. The locomotion system could be a bit better, teleporter get on my nerve, but that's a minor issue. I love the support for Mods. Great stuff! :)
best game ever

I think this is the only VR title I've given a 5 star rating to date. There's nothing that really needs to be said; this is an astonishing masterpiece (and it's FREE!)

The downside to playing this is that you're going to be comparing it to other similar styled VR games and you're going to be dissappointed that a free game is better than a paid one. 

This has my stamp of approval - the first stamp I've given.
best game
The current platinum standard of VR games, that all others should be measured against.
i like this game

The game is amazing, but way too short. I love the graphics and gameplay. The handling is awesome. Such a game with bigger maps, longer missions, more wepons, more and other enemys. I would even spend a 100 dollar for this. as nobody offers such a game. I played a walktrough and killed all missions besides 2. I love it and i regret having it played so much cause it is over. Please do some. I will buy!
can be played on systems not really designed for VR...
Awesome game.  Everything I ever wanted in a VR shooter and plus a little extra.  I hope we get new levels some day.

This game is a VR marvel from a gameplay mechanics perspective--they get so many of the small details just right.

Only downside is that replayability is a but lack luster after completion, if you've been getting most of the achievements as you go. Also, the narrative is a bit lacking. But compared to what it's up against in the VR space, Robo Recall is among the best of the best.
Looks and plays incredibly. Fun variety of weapons. Easy enough for a newbie to pick up, but the star challenges add variety and challenge for veterans.

review_title: Makes the oculus price worth it.
one_reviews_text: This game is simply awesome. Extremly nice graphics and great gameplay. Don't get down on yourself if you have trouble early on, a huge assortment of upgrades will ensure you will be recalling like the best of them in no time!
Great game love the arcade feel in VR, only wish it was longer.
What are you waiting for. Dont even download the other crap. You will love this.
Amazing game to show a complete VR experience, the imersion in the action is wonderfull and the gameplay is great fun, try it to believe , you wont regret it.
One of the best VR has to offer. That's including all the VR platforms.
Amazing game! It`s almost as much fun as the shooting range!
Just like the old school arcade machines - this time you're inside the world. Great immersion and a lot of fun to play.
Totally built for VR and it shows, brilliant pace and game play, cant recommend it enough.

Great content is vital to enjoying any new platform and this alone was enough to make the rift stand head and shoulders over competing headsets in thier commitment to VR. The quality of this free tittle (with touch) is better than almost all the paid content out there. And its highly replayable with all the mods out there too.
unreal.. engine. and also unreal
Just an amazing first VR experience if a little short (problem with every VR games).
Tried it with the locomotion mod which lets you freely walk around, felt really motion sick. Try it :D

It just works perfect with touch, aiming is brilliant compared to the games i've played so far. You can spend a lot of time, trying to push your score, so it's worth the money (if you wouldn't get it for free with the controllers)
But a bit more of everything would be nice. Weapons or at least upgrades and maybe some maps (with different location).

This game is awesome. So immersive. Brilliant graphics. Fun and intelligent gameplay. Works perfectly with touch controllers. Has a great mix of gameplay, difficulty and fun. Amusing and professional sounds. Very rational teleport controls. In fact I can't fault this game other than to say that it should have had more levels, more guns, just more! Shame you can't teleport high up though. Was hoping to scare myself a little :-)

I took a long break from oculus after the initial release and after recently receiving the touch handsets this was the first game I installed.
So glad that I did as it has revamped my enthusiasm and faith in the VR industry.  Awesome game smooth graphics, its obviously not going to be as richly detailed as general PC games and same for the length.  But this is to be expected and people who seem to want more really dont understand the industry and market at the moment.  I think this game is outstanding and lots of genuine fun with glimpses of the mammoth capabilities that VR has.
I'd drown puppies to get more content for this game. It's killer.
I'm having an unreasonable amount of fun with this game.
I loved this game!. Best I ever played on VR.

This is one of the few games where I don't feel developers have gone "wohoo, we have a game sorta working in VR now, lets release it". The mechanics are great, the design is amazing and it is POLISHED. Scale is good, you don't have stupidly scaled objects scattered around like is so common. Interactions with enemy is awesome. Details matters and this is the standard of quality I wish other games showed. On the downside, a bit short.

Robo Recall instantly grabbed my attention when I first played. The physics engine is amazing and really immersed me in the world. The scale of objects; from a pistol in your hands to giant flying robots and skyscrapers blew me away! Graphics and sound design are great! However, the missions are a very similar to one another and do get a little repetive. Still, this a really fun title that is funny, engaging and exciting! Also there is mod support which is a huge bonus. Robo Recall is a game that I can definitely recommend to Oculus Rift owners.

review_title: A good mix, makes a good VR game
one_reviews_text: First person view VR provides great immersion, Touch Controllers provides great object manipulation, 3rd person view provides great locomotion control... with great VR being a recipe made of the right mix of the separate ingredients that currently work in VR. And the Robo Recall VR recipe, that is made of ~40% VR immersion, ~40% object manipulation and ~20% locomotion control... makes for a good VR game, despite being a first person game that only provides locomotion through teleportation (that is poorly suited and even downright frustrating for grabbing robots slightly out of your reach). Noteworthy :  This game is designed to welcome third party add-ons, and it's active community has created a 90% working free locomotion add-on and much more for it.
This game is the best VR game I've ever played and this is what I use to show off VR to people who have never experienced it.

review_title: best VR game i played so far
one_reviews_text: far the best! ;)

In my opinion this game is probably the best designed game I've played in VR. The game dimensions feel spot on, the graphics super clean, and when I aim the guns, they feel spot on. I just wish I didn't suck so horribly at it.

I received it free because I purchased the touch controllers but even if I had to purchase it I would have felt it was worth the money. Controls are overall pretty smooth and the gameplay is fun. Teleporting around was a bit finiky though and I didn't always face the direction I wanted to.

Super fun replayable content. First real VR game I have ever played, and I am really diggin' it! Once you really explore the controls and the space, it starts feeling normal to reach out and throw a Robot. Love the way to loadout is wrapped around you, and really more fun that reloading. Also like teleporting for point blank headshots!
This is the game VR was made for! so much FUN!!! Got a bit of a story, amazing graphics and some much shooty fun! This was my first buy, and I have not looked back.
Highly recommend
Best vr shooter game hope to see the second part of this game

The graphics are great.  I love to retire Robots in this fast action games.  I recommend buying it.  Sometimes when overwhelmed with attacks I start to laugh as I cower to avoid the barrage of bullets.

The first proper game I played in VR and still one of the best! Got this free with Summer of Rift bundle. You have to experience it in VR - videos do this no justice whatsoever (same can be said with all VR games I guess). I hope Epic Games is working on more VR games! i5 4690K / 16GB / 1080FTW2 - everything cranked to max - Plays great!
Very fun game and great VR experience
Best VR experience so far
