In my opinion, this is one of the best shooting games available on Oculus.
Fantastic game. My fav VR game by far.
Many weapons, very cool vr experience

One of my first games I played with the touch controllers but it is super fun. Once you get the hang of the controls you start feeling like a superman. Ducking bullets, shooting with 2 hands in different directions etc.

Repetative but somehow not getting boring :)
I ripped a robots arm off its chassis and then beat his stupid robot friends up with it.

One of the best games for touch. The teleporting move is similar to other games. It works well. Also the shooting and scenarios are nice. The graphic is also very good and stable, meaning no blurs. The action is good balanced meaning that your are busy, but it feel manageable.
please add free movement i hate teleporting it really spoils the game i would change it to five stars if they did.

i have played lots of shooters, but this one is definitly my favourite. it has a great story with robots, is like terminator, and your job is to take down the boss odin. it has very good graphics, lots of weapons and upgrades. another thing is that whe you pull the trigger , its so smooth that it feels real, is an amazing experience that doesnt cost too much. you dont need a lot of space too. i play this game in a normal office with less than the recomended space and y played perfectky. BEST GAME EVER
excelllent fun
A VR must.  Very fun.
Fast paced fun.

Killing robots by shooting them with guns, throwing bullets, and even beating them with theirown limbs. What could be better?
Well, the great use of the motion controllers and immersive gameplay really top it off.
this is the best shooting game i ever played

Crashes often. Would like to check out some mods. Would love a "map-maker" for this game... I could really get into creating some story content in this game engine. Mod support in oculus app (nonexistant) keeps reinforcing the bad decision to get the facebook vr. This game is a really run arcade shooter and will work fine in small or large spaces. No accidents while playing.
I think I liked the story in Raw Data more, but this had a fun arcade feel that made killing hordes of enemies more fun.  Probably the best looking shooter I've played so far in VR.
Awesome game! Would be cool to add more missions and a free locomotion mode :)

But crashes on loading level 1.2, 2.1, or any other. When I can get level 2.1 to load, the audio stops working in less than a minute.

Maybe itès a good game, but i'll never know because it's the most unstable AAA VR game on oculus or Steamvr. 2 stars because the tutorial was fun, and i didn't pay for it or else i'd be pissed.
please!!! by far the best game for oculus.

I own a decent amount of VR-games but this is the game I'm coming back to again and again. I was really hoping a sequel would be announced at Connect 4 because this is still my favorite of 'em all!

Robo Recall 2, bring it team Epic and Oculus!

Hands down, this game has the best VR shooter mechanics. The movement, weapons, upgrade system, and melee combat are all top-notch. Really wish we would have seen a coop mode as well, but still a fantastic title to show off the system.

This game is one of the main reasons I purchased Oculus. It was the first game I played. Several months later, I'm still playing it! The fact that it is free is just as great as the game. I would 100% purchase if I had to. IT IS AMAZING!
every time i try to play it ,it bugs and shuts down the game and window of oculus closes on me love it but mess up evey time i try to go into tne 1st mission telport

The content is a bit limited (it could have more weapons (4) and environments (9 levels?)) but it makes up for it by having a progression system (weapon upgrades) achievement hunting and leaderboards, it reminds me more of an Arcade game and is not really story driven (just enough to add a certain atmosphere and give the boss enemies a bit of character).  

It has very good gameplay, it feels like the Dev's thought of everything, even when you let a weapon fall to the ground you don't need to pick it up again you just point at it and it flies back into your hand if you grab. There is absolutely challenge to be had in the game as well, the difficulty ramps up over time, i do not have a lot of room, can only play seated, the later levels absolutely require a bit more movement to evade bullets for example so i have not beaten the game yet. But overall, this is a must have for anybody who wants to shoot some stuff.
awsome!! No mutliplayer :(
It needs more it's a Cliffhanger
Best VR game by far. I hope they make more like this.
THis game is unreal. Its still to date the best game in my opinion that has been made for VR. WEll done indeed.
Awesome sauce man games amazing

This game is SO much fun on the Vive (using revive) and, of course, even better on the Rift. I'm upset that this is an exclusive, because all of the Vive owners NEED to experience this masterpiece. Additionally, the game has a surprisingly amount of replay value! Are you a Rift owner? PLAY THIS. IT'S FREE. Are you a Viver? This game is totally worth the thirty dollars, so go for it (be warned though, the revive process was tricky for me)!

review_title: I can't stop playing this game!!!
one_reviews_text: This game sold me on VR.  it's awesome!!

Its free, but if you own a Vive or Windows MR (or something similar) its definitely worth buying... in my view the best arcade shooter out there (its very good looking, immersive, gets your heart pumping and superfun).
this is such a great game

review_title: Free with Touch, funnest game yet
one_reviews_text: I got this game free with Touch, but I would have paid the $20 for this game if it didn't. This game is a blast and there is a lot of fun stuff like gun attachments and several different types of robots to recall. The boss is a meme master, what else can I say.

Great game, the VR feels fluid and the physics are very nice. Im sure with the unlimited mods that can be added the game will increase in playability. However, at the current moment you have 3 distinct areas and they are all very short in terms of playability. The challenges add another level to aim for, but even they they get a little stale. Great game to be thrown in for free, and has wetted my appitite for VR, now just want the main course.....nom nom nom.
Easily better than any arcade shooter I've ever played. Likely the one of the best games I've ever played. Everything that VR can be in a simple, awesome package.

review_title: funnest shooting game, good for demos
one_reviews_text: great graphics, great style, dialogue, story, everything. fun and replayable. this is my go-to game for demoing.
... only if you like teleportation! I personally can't get along with teleportation no matter how hard I try. Besides that it is certainly the best or among the best VR shooters.

Top tier quality built game - excellent graphics, sound, and gameplay. Make sure you have the vibration setting checked, having the haptic feedback when you shoot really adds to the immersion. 

Wish it were longer, but overall an awesome truly enjoyable experience with A LOT of replay value. A must have!

review_title: I Put My Hand Through The Ceiling Fan

one_reviews_text: Brilliant!  get the locomaotion mod for it and its dope!

review_title: One of the best of VR; Fast paced
one_reviews_text:
+: One of the best VR experiences so far – everyone that tied were pleased so far!
+: Challenges to unlock perks with ability to replay the game somewhat differently with a different weapon loadout and due to the fact that each level of gameplay is a learning experience.
+: Overall good and fluid graphics and sound effects.
=: Some situations required player to be responsive and can prove to be stressful (a plus or a minus depending on your personality – by example one of us literally had to quit the game).
=: Control Scheme while not perfect is interesting - Not always picking up weapon makes you wonder if you did something wrong.
-: Physics for the cup are like a bouncing ball – this is such a letdown it almost ruined the whole game – joke apart this is a 5 out of 5 game based on what was released as of September 2017!
SPOILER +: Slight shills at the end of the introduction.
Super Fun and great Graphics!
The game flows very good and the weapons feel great. To be able to slow down time and pick up the enemies make you feel like a superhero. The graphics are also nice.

The answer to "What would a Bandai and Paul Verhoven R-Rated collaboration of Asimov's I Robot look like?"  A bit short with some infuriating challenges, but probably the most fun FPS I have ever played!   Robo-Recall 2 please.

Honestly at first when I had my rift set up and saw this in my library I pretty much turned a blind eye. Thinking it was some cheapy arcade VR thing you get for free.

Oh god how wrong I was...

Its probably one of the best VR games out at the moment. Comfortable to play, yet exciting and can get quite tense if not stressful. Its so immersive that at often times I would accidentally punch my TV because of how close it is to my play area (quite forcefully I may add).

Just play it, you will not regret it. Also keep in mind, you dont need a huge space for it but try to have no objects near your space above waist height!!!
That teleportation system is not really userfriendly i think. In fact at the time the AI "help system" tells you to "keep moving" you turns out of strategy and lose the funny way to play.
One of the best, fun and most exciting VR games out there today.

If you like shooter, this is the #1 game for VR. On september 2017 this is the state of the art first person shooter, why?
1) Perfekt immersion
2) Perfekt grafik for this time
3) Believable "story", why you do what you do.
4) Your own movement are plausible.
3) Enemys are working nice and some time stupid, BUT this are plausible for the game context too.
I want to thank the developers so much. I really have enjoyed this very much...
I´m playing VR for a month now and this if by far the best game I´ve played. Highly recommended if you are an action game fan.

review_title: Robo Recall set the bar at a new height
one_reviews_text: I had tried this game at a friend's house when it came out. Alongside Dead Hungry and Dead and Buried, Robo Recall is actually one of the games that made me buy a Rift + Touch for myself. Yes, it is that good. It is not multiplayer (well, not as of writing this review anyhow), but this game, along-side Dead and Buried, is a must have. Another perfect execution of a VR game for a very enjoyable experience. Other devs won't be able to match this anytime soon. Robo Recall set the bar at a new height for VR games. Plus, trust me, you'll get some exercise playing this.
The best gameplay I have seen in VR since I got mine. And for FREE???? No words, just get it. Why not?
I Keep coming back to this one over and over because the game mechanics and all around fun of this game is unmatched.
Such a fun game.  Will make you sweat!  Please come out with more content or a new version.  Would snap it up in a second.
More fun and bether graphic ;-)

review_title: best all round VR  experience to date
one_reviews_text: this is touch VR 2017 at its best, the game runs perfectly well for me on a entry level  game laptop ( gtx 1060), you should setup the 2 sensors for 360 tracking to make it truly remarkable.  i used a  usb2 extension cable with booster ,  no issues at all.

This game is amazing. Although it may seem short for completing just nine play areas, they get increasingly difficult. Once completing of the nine areas you can go back and finish collecting the rest of the stars for the level by earning higher points. This is by far my favorite game for the Oculus. (They Epic team really knows what they're doing!)

review_title: My FAVORITE Game for VR (That says alot)
one_reviews_text: I have to say that this has quickly become one of my favorite games to play in Oculus Rift.  The graphics are incredible, it is a real challenge, (Still not past level  one,  I strive to be perfect in games) and I love every minute I spend in this program.  I will surely watch for more titles by this developer as time progresses and hope they come out with other titles.  Try it if you like first person shooters. You WON'T be disappointed!
this game is way better than i thought it would be, fast paced action, loads of fun to play

review_title: One of the best VR graphics game
one_reviews_text: Im new to VR, but have tried quite lots of game, video and more, the graphic is great, action is great (you'll then forget about CV1 res, and gaps) No motion sickness, sometimes a bit disoriented but I guess need more practice
This title is awesome and remains one of my Oculus touch favorites. I wish it was longer. I'd pay for an expansion!

What a game!!! Wow! I really need to finish my game room quickly...and Oculus team...pls complete the wireless system fast. games like this needs the player to be able to move quickly in all directions. I can feel the cable and its a distraction.
There is nothing more to say... Looking forward to see more stuff like that in the future ;)
This is simply the best VR game that I have ever played. A very well done shooter.
Looks amazing, good gameplay for many hours. Just clik buy now ;) Must Have!

No words to describe the sensations.

Please, try it and love it.
This is a great game! I would have spent $20 for it. My only complaint is the length of it. Maybe an expansion or Multiplayer function DLC?
Say no more...

Would give 4.5 stars really. Intense action shooter that is nicely polished, great graphics and gameplay and hard to be really good at! Have not finished it yet but my only concern might be that once it is finished I will be wanting more! DLC in the future possibly?
this game shows how fun VR can be and shows the potential for long term FP shooters. so comfortable and fun to play.

review_title: Light gun games are BACK BABY
one_reviews_text:
So happy. Finally got into VR with the summer of rift and I have to admit I had my doubts about this stuff. remembering not being very happy with the Wii stuff of the past I was worried that motion control and VR would kind of be only a marginal improvement. How wrong I was! Never been happier to be wrong. We finally have a technologically advanced successor to the old vampire night/time crisis arcade machines that I loved so much growing up. Robo Recall is a fantastic shooter with a lot of fun to be had and if you play it like I do you can work up a serious sweat :D 
Thanks for the free game, this rocks.

This game sets high standarts for VR-shooter. Smooth, good looking graphics, good physics, exact controls. This game looks as it should look like. Very great VR experience with lots of fun even for newbs . But I loved to have more content....

An incredible game. It is both fun and funny. Lots of Portal-esque humor mixed with hot gameplay. Epic has set the bar for high quality VR gaming. Be warned that it can feel rather intense at first and you might forget that teleportation is a thing. After the first level I was out of breath from dodging and fighting all over my play area like I was in Equilibrium. It is quite a thrill!

It's an exceptionally well polished game. And it really shows what can be achieved. It's the best use of teleportation that I've seen so far in a game.

My only gripe is that like most VR titles the story is minimal and there's only a couple of areas. 

It's free though so it's definitely worth the play.

I love this game, everything about it except one thing. It says you can play sitting, but no matter what setting I do, I'm always 2 feet tall. Which is fine :D because this is still my favorite VR game :)
Best rage game ever. if you like action. if you like evil dead one liners. if you like ripping off your foe's arm and beating him to death with it. check this out! never gets old.!
Great game and comes free with the Touch Controller set.  This is a MUST HAVE game in every Rift/Touch owner's library.

With All the mod capability I dont know why they arent creating new content for us or at least something that would keep busy a simple mod where you could defeat waves would be amazing. Come on guys please!

This is a great game that really showcases what VR can do. The physics are 10/10, graphics 10/10, and while the story and levels leave a little to be desired, they are still really, really good. There is also a good deal of replayability, as most people (myself included) probably won't finish the game with 50/50 stars. The weapon system is great; with 2 different weapons for each holster (Pistol and Revolver for side, Shotgun and Energy Rifle for back), and the way that you can choose what to upgrade the weapons with is great. The fact that this comes FREE with the Oculus Touch bundle is ridiculous, and I definately would have paid for this if it wasn't included. Pick it up if you didn't get it with the Touch bundle, you won't regret it!

review_title: A VR masterpiece that never gets old!
one_reviews_text:
This is a great game with a lot of replay value, for reasons similar to why Mario is replayable: It encourages you to keep doing even better on the same levels, by finding new ways to do the same thing. There are so many different ways to defeat each enemy, and so many ways to raise your score, that I don't think I could ever get bored with this game entirely. It's not too challenging, but not too easy either, and the controls aren't too hard to get used to. The game feels pretty immersive as well, although it isn't overly intense despite that fact, because the game has sort of it's own campy style of humor that doesn't take away much from immersion, but also makes immersion in the game feel tolerable and not overwhelming. This could have easily been very different though, given the entire game entails being surrounded hordes of killer robots.

Also, the best part (in my opinion) is the levels can be pretty short, making it a great game to play in between doing other things! That alone has made this game one that I keep coming back to all the time. Definitely a 10/10, and a true VR masterpiece that was essentially my introduction to the Oculus Rift.

I bought the Oculus DK2 just for ***** & giggles. I knew though that with time, more research and a little imagination that VR could only improve. As soon as I put on the DK2 and found myself in a black room of endless nothingness standing in front of a low res office desk I knew that VR held the future of gaming... Heck, the whole entertainment industry can and will benefit from VR. Being able to stand in that empty black space and look at that desk just as I would look at the desk my gaming rig sets on simply blew my mind. The possibilities that ran through my mind at that very moment were endless and if these thoughts were going through my mind they surely were going through the minds of gaming developers... Weren't they? Now that semi-practical VR (it's still expensive) is finally here and I've got the real deal, I'm waiting for all of those "possibilities" to become a reality. It seems that I am going to be waiting for a long time unfortunately. Because of the price point, many gamers can't afford to hit the VR scene, which leaves many devs scared to spend the kind of cash that is needed to make a AAA blockbuster VR game. This unfortunately leaves all of us having to sift through a lot of crap just to simply find a VR game with half of the sparkle that a AAA game has. Every now and then though you do find diamond in the rough, but even those games are good, they tend to be really short with little or no replay value. RoboRecall is really good. The graphics are on point and the audio backs it up. The ability to kill robots in various different ways is a huge plus and keeps the game fresh. The only thing that kills it for me is the lackluster plot mixed with (IMO) a little to much 90's rail shooter flair. The plot is a huge deal for me and if the storyline were there I would definately rate it at 5 stars!
This game is so much fun. Great designs, gameplay and graphics.

Incredibly tight and fluid. Great teleportation mechanic. The only reason I stopped playing was because I punched my fist into a robot in virtual reality but into a stone fireplace in regular reality. True story. The only thing I'd like to see improved is (more) sound attenuation and HRTF on key sounds. I often think there's something behind me or on the side of me, but nothing's there, and vice versa. It makes it tricky to prioritize. Anyway, excellent game! If you enjoy arcade action games - you'll love this.

This game is just amazing! Hands down the best VR game on Oculus. 

The gunplay is polished to a mirror shine and visuals are stunning. Fights are fast and require quick thinking. Amount of different kills you can perform on your enemies is amazing. Long range headshots, close range shotgun blasts, grab a robot and rip his head/arm/leg off or use it as a shield. It has it all. While the objectives are mostly to just kill or defend (occasionaly some boss) there is just great variety of ways HOW to approach these objectives. 

A minor gripe I have with this game is a variety of available weapons. You get only 4 different weapons. It could use a bit more. However the weapons you do get are nice and customizable.

Story while a bit silly it's a good king of silly. It doesn't try to take it self too seriously. And the quite comedic naration adds to the fun factor. 

And thats the main word I would use to describe this game. FUN. Go ahead and grab it if you can. You won't be sorry.

Just completed the first runthrough of the game and I have to say this is a very high quality VR title. From the controls to thegameplay and graphics i was blown away! Tons of replay value on the missions as it is an "Arcady" type experience so you want to fully upgrade all weapons as well as try and beat your own score and get up there on the global leaderboard :) my fave game to date, great job :)

this was the first game i played on VR on a friends device before i got my own. now i own my own i keep going back to this game over and over so much fun and great controls. replayability of the game to get achievments is great!
In my opinion this is a must have game and the best shooter for VR; pitifully the game is not complete, it needs urgently a multiplayer  option; 4 stars until then.
Get this game! get it get it get it get it!
Awesome game! :D

review_title: A Short and Sweet VR Game
one_reviews_text: Although a very short game which only lasted 1.5 hours, it's very replayable to finish the other challenges, get stars from them and unlock new things.  It has 4 Weapons you can customize and about 4 others that you have to use robots for (Big Bot's Laser, Fast Bot's Whip, Drone's Charge Laser and Crawler's Explosion).  4 Weapons i feel is too few, as i would have preferred maybe 6-8 instead and also, there's No Endless Mode!  Endless Mode would've been great for this game, however, they didn't add it in but hey, this game comes free so it's good enough for me.  I had a blast playing this game, and so will you!
it is very fun, and its a blast to play through. its probably free, if not, its worth it.

Wow, simply wow.  The graphics are great, the gunplay is immense and the futuristic setting with a pumping 80's music feel is wonderful.  I can see myself playing this for years and trying to unlock every star possible.  It's great.
I played this Game since 3 days, and i have to say this is a must have. its a pity it has only 9 Missions on 3 Maps, but the graphics and the gameplay is truly amazing. 10/5 Stars for this Game

Here we go my first review, robo recall! the best game for oculus, the gameplay, maps, visuals, music, design the whole thing is just amazing, should i mention other things aswell like the movement, its just a masterpiece, hopefully they will expand on this in the future with more content, but wow what a game!
See title
The dialogue is hilarious and super polished graphics for VR.  non-stop action! Love it!!!
Robo Recall is one of the best VR games you can play. Responsive, fun, great graphics, and feels like a full game. If you are on the fence, just get this game, you won't regret it.
I recommend to buy

Very amazing FPS game. Free and progression is fun. You level up, unlock guns and upgrades. You can try new ways to achieve missions and beat your score and others'. Quality and gameplay is just perfect.
This is for sure my favorite game for my OCULUS RIFT the graphic is stunnig and it is very enjoyable, everytime I play it I get a lot of fun. It should be a model for other game producers

I got this with the Oculus Bundle. It's a great game, and so far absolutely the best. It looks great even without multisampling. This is a must buy game for Rift, and something that Vive fanboys are drooling on.

The Unreal engine spins my fans up to the max while showing the sorry message while never loading the game with a endless pulse circle and black screen. I had to close the engine with the task manager.
I recently picked up the Oculus and this game has honestly been the most fun of any of the games I've tried. It helps that it came with the bundle! The only complaint I can make is I want more!

review_title: This is as good as everyone is saying
one_reviews_text: If you were a big fan of Time Crisis and that style of arcade shootemups. You'll probably like this. It has a good tongue in cheek theme and really satisfying gameplay. Excellent game
Although it feels a bit short, it feels incredibly polished and intuitive. This game has set my expectations high for other games, making me fear they will not live up to what this game has to offer
Due to my pc not meeting basic requirements, i had to disable all unessary start up process and unused apps, now all games work extremely well (cpu-fx8320, gpu 390x)

Pros: One of the greatest VR experiences out there. Amazing, gorgeous, funny, intense, all of that.

Cons: Occasional mysterious performance hitches even on powerful systems. Nothing is perfect. I want more stages!
robo the best

This game is absolutely amazing. It really sets the bar for VR shooters. It has memorable characters, a short-but-entertaining story mode, weapon progression, challenges, replayability, and fast paced action.

I do hate the teleport system, but as I got this free with my bundle I gave the game a try and i must say it is still a good game and workout where you have to make decisions fast on how to disable to robot. catching bullets, tearing robots apart, throwing them or even use them as a shield. So many options to kill them :D

Very good game, can only recommend. Another game i will show people that test VR for the first time as its simple to grasp yet awesome to play.
Although i must say that some of the things you have to do for stars are not that easy.
Exciting, Awesome mechanics, Great graphics, so much fun.  Must own VR game!

review_title: Best Free game of all time
one_reviews_text: This game is amazing. With new weapons, upgrades, and mods I can see myself playing this for a really long time. Epic sure does know how to polish a beautiful game.

review_title: First tried et yet prefered vr game
one_reviews_text:
So fun, so crazy, so playable.
Only one issue for me : after a few hours, game become laggy on specific saved games.
But.. My pc doesn't have recommended hardware, so I can't complain.
Best VR Game!
This game is absolutely amazing, extremely fun, nice setting, really challenging. The VR element is matched perfectly for this game, it really feels, as if you are in the game.

If all game developers put this much effort into their games, VR would have been #1 today. This game is loaded with it all, you can fight them, throw them, use them, shoot them, execute them, you can do tricks, dodge, the list goes on.

Graphics are top notch, gameplay is smooth, the game is what VR is all about.
As the first game I used on the Rift (I have played a few PSVR games), this was awesome. I can almost see Unreal Tournament VR... @epicgames, hint hint hint
I  had to say this is a mother fXXXer great game.  Just but it.

This is incredible, the controls are sublime despite being entirely new to the gaming world. It looks great with a cool aesthetic and makes the player feel powerful, tearing an enemy robot in half, throwing each half at a different enemy and then grabbing a shotgun from your back to finish them off. Amazing stuff
Looks amazing, plays great! We need Epic to do more games on Oculus!
Beautifull game with great gameplay. Also very good physical excercise! 10/10
Simple concept flawless execution, it's a lightgun game in the arcade tradition. As a guy who grew up playing Time Crisis in the arcades this is the game that 10 year old me dreamed of.

These developers made a game for VR. And its awesome. You can also spend your money on Elite Dangerous, a bad port from pc with the developers giving zero **** about you and your money. No thanks, ill spend it on Robo Recall!

I havent purchased many games with my Rift yet but I am so glad it came with the touch controllers. I played this game every day for about a week while varying the amount of time. Visually it is the best game I have played and while it took a little while to get use to the movement after playing it became second nature. I hope they add more levels or something because while I can replay levels to try and get more stars to upgrade the weapons I have hit a wall where I can't seem to do better at the score. Only issue I have noticed is every time I start the game it says there is a focus issue and it is resolved by clicking the mouse on the screen. Not a huge deal but can be annoying when I am already wearing the Rift and ready to start.

That game is simply amaizng.  Never have I been so immersed in a VR experience.  Will definitely get your heart pumping.  The game let you be very creative with whatever is available in the heat of the moment

In reality I can't get my thumbs up, they hurt from playing this game so much. It truly is a great and fun game. I recommend to anyone who wants one for their VR. It's a blast to watch others play as well.

The perfect game to show off to your friends if they want some action! It's smooth, great weapon handling, awesome audio and quite funny here and there. It's crazy they're giving it away for free with the Oculus Touch!

review_title: Go-to title for VR action game
one_reviews_text: This is a representative example of what action games in VR could and should be. Still gets 5 stars even though there are very few missions as this game blows everything else away. If all games had a worse than/equal to/ better than robo-recall rating you'd know exactly which titles were excellent (equal to) or not yet existing jaw droppingly amazing (better than). Buy touch controllers, play this game, you cannot be disappointed
Remember in CoD you saw an NPC doing epic stuff while you ran around and just shot guys? Yeah, you're that NPC in this whole game.

One of the best show case early VR AA titles in my opinion.  It always blows my friends away and they want VR.  With that said it's quite short and there are only 3 locations with about 3 missions in each. The gun handling is done very well and the entertainment comes in the form of arcade style Mayhem. Good fun 4/5

review_title: Best Game out of All for VR
one_reviews_text: Every console or system has their iconic game title, and I feel that for VR, this game is it! Though arcadey with no real 'story' - it is FUN! It handles VR and motion controllers perfectly. This is the type of game that really puts you inside. I don't mind living inside here. RIP reality body, 10/10 would sacrifice body to destroy robots again.

Pro: Great graphics, intuitive, good tutorial, simply fun. 

Shows the potential of VR. Hopefully other developers adopt this concept for game design.

Con: Game is too short, a little repetitive, deserves 4.5 stars. 

Recommendations: More weapons (rocket launcher, mines, etc.) , multiplayer feature, longer story, life meter, bigger robots, sheilds, options for free movement vs. teleportation, etc.

This is a first rate example of a VR single player FPS. Everything from the gun play to fist fighting to the voice acting is masterfully executed. Given it's free, there is no reason not to grab this.
Honestly the most fun i've had gaming in oh so many years, this is what makes buying VR worth it
don't load anymore .. nice game
This game is the definition of a VR game. Seriously, if you don't have it, you may as well sell your Oculus
can't play the game it always crashes and once in a bluemoon it works, if im lucky

An easy purchase for lovers of action, a wild shootout experience with plenty of ways to "recall" robots, some mod support, unlockable weapons and attachments, and challenging replayability. I haven't had this much fun in a vr game before
This game, to me, is the gold standard for how FP shooters should be in VR.
I wish this had more levels. It's so fun! Feels like an old school arcade.
Excellent. I would pay for this one. History line could be a bit more mature, deeper context, but it is OK for the purpose of introducing someone to VR. Graphics 10+
I felt like Neo from the Matrix. I played it for like 30 mins and although I usually dont play many shooter games, this one will be played more, its mechanics are stunning.
This is what to you want to show your friends when doing a VR demo

review_title: best FPS VR game on the market
one_reviews_text: this is a highly polished very well-done FPS. shooting & reloading mechanics fun, ability to punch and throw enemies. teleportation method extremely well done. variety of interesting enemies. great graphics. So fun that I wish there are even more missions!

Only unlocked one level. This is worth purchasing. Just as functional as SUPERHOT VR and just as fun in similar and different ways. In this game, you are able to tear robots apart limb from limb and use limb from limb to beat the limbs off other attacking robots, then you can use their limbs to block bullets or simply throw them at car doors.
BUY IT!

I was really worried when I bought a VR headset cause I thought it wouldnt be good enough to hold my interest and it would be a waste of money.  For awhile it was loooking to be that way, then I played this. SOO MUCH FUN.  I got it free, but if I hadnt, this game would be worth every penny whatever the cost. So many ways to interact with the game and the setting is clever and fun.

this, ladies and gentlemen, is the reason why VR has been invented. this game is a holodeck experience into a frenetic shooter/brawler. everything in this game is absolutely fantastic and polished, all the small details and the hidden features make this game a must have. 
now you can stop paying for your gym subscription and just play one hour of Robo Recall a day.

review_title: i punched my monitor, and i wasnt mad :)
one_reviews_text:
it was free. and its better than alot of paid
games.  You can play sitting down,but i recommend getting touch controllers. 3rd sensor for room scale. and hanging cords from ceiling. then have plenty of room so you dont punch things...maybe that should be first on list.

Edging out SPT only because of the inclusion of a story and missions, Robo Recall is THE definitive FPS/Wave shooter available. Movement is smooth and intuitive, weapon accuracy is great, enemy variety is awesome, the missions are challenging, fun, and well paced, and the whole thing is SUPER polished. While it could use a few more weapons or the inclusion of a horde mode, as it stands now this is the bar against which all other FPS/Wave shooters in VR are measured.
Certainly the best game in VR

review_title: Honestly, the best game so far!
one_reviews_text: A very simple game but the most immersive VR experienced in a year of Oculus gaming. You can do whatever you want in the way you want, it's intuitive, funny.. It is THE game!

review_title: Very Immersive and Lot's of Fun
one_reviews_text: One of the best VR games I've played so far. The graphics are great and when you're playing you really feel like you're in the game. Definitely worth getting.
Most satisfying VR platform yet

review_title: Please sir, can I have some more
one_reviews_text: A bruised elbow, a kicked dog and a broken vase. Grab a robot, rip his leg off and beat another robot to pieces with it... This game is bloody awesome!!!

What else is there to say? Amazing graphics (even if it was a non VR title) great tongue-in-cheek humor, and absolutely riveting gameplay. I was so lost in this VR world that I have even thrown my controllers down like they were spent guns...good thing for the wrist straps.  The freedom of this game gives it near infinite replayability since you can destroy robots in dozens of ways. The fact that it's free with touch is the best deal I've seen in a long while. Go play!

review_title: You can't do that in normal game!
one_reviews_text: It is just incredible how good this game plays and looks. You do so many cool actions all the time and toy with fantastic physics. Just fantastic
I've had VR for a couple days now and this just blows my mind by far the coolest thing in VR so far.
Cool graphics and very fun gameplay. I love the story, it looks very original.
I had a blast playing this game. I bet you will too.
Best way to start your VR Life with this game!

Excellent action and shooting experience. Pretty much a killer app. To be able to have this kind of experience at home and not in an arcade is just astounding. Really expert and graceful game design which allows for a fun experience while also understanding the limitations of current tech. Bravo. Must have.

review_title: What the VR standard should be.
one_reviews_text: Robo Recall is by all means a AAA title. It runs perfectly on my GTX 1060 and the controls and features of the game are so immersive. Dodging and catching bullets, ripping the robots limbs off, adding attachments to weapons and just everything you could even think of. On top of that are the graphics that come with it. It's most definitley on of the best experiences on VR right now.
very good game.
Fun and quirky.  It's nods to arcade shooters with the audio and menu style are apt since it plays like an advanced arcade line shooter in a good way.

This is probably the best experience I've had with the Oculus Rift so far. It's so much fun and you really feel like you're immersed in the world. From grabbing robots to use as bullet sponge shields (and catching bullets :P) to air juggling robots in the air, it's definitely one game you'll come back to. I highly recommend checking it out!

Only bad thing about this game is thats theres only 9 levels... this VR content has to start getting better I beat this thing in like a day. Absolutely most fun game so far the writting and content is just hilarious and is the most well put together shooter ive played so far. definite buy. cant believe it came free.
This game its short, but it give you an idea of what VR shooter can be. a long and more complex game with the same mechanics will  be just amazing.

Great game 10/10

I love it in its current stay. Be cool if it had co-op or something. That'd be awesome! None the less a very well made game, fun shooter game, I highly recommend playing. It will keep you wanting more!

review_title: Great game made for VR & free!
one_reviews_text: It is still my favorite VR experience so far. Interesting interractions, teleporting system & gameplay. It shows the power of VR games & it's free!

I got this free with the rift & to be honest I have barely touched anything else. It's an amazing game that reminds me of time crysis. The treleporting feels great, the weapons all feel different and useful & being able to teleport in & rip robots apart is so much fun. I've only got a gtx 970 but this game still runs buttery smooth.

My only cirtisism would be that the way scoring works it favours melee too mcuh. I think using a combination of this feel much better and when you string a good run together you feel amazing.

review_title: Hands down the most fun I've had on Rift
one_reviews_text:
I've wanted a Rift for ages, only just been able to afford it in the summer sale. Part of my wanting it so badly of late was when I saw videos of Robo Recall.

It absolutely is as much fun as it looks. Its hands down the most fun I've had on Rift so far. I keep dabbling in other games, but I keep coming back to Robo Recall.

The graphics are brilliant (the reflections are so cool). I run a GTX1080 and it's as smooth as butter. I've even bumped the Super Sampling up to 1.5 and I've not noticed any frame drops.

This is the kind of fun action I want from my Rift. I'm all for a good story experience, but sometimes all you want is to dive straight in and shoot akimbo pistols and tear robots limb from limb lol.

Everytime I play it I seem to find a new cool feature I didn't know about before from the helpful tips that flash up while its loading.

If you haven't got this yet it absolutely needs to be the next game you download!

review_title: Sometimes the best games are free
one_reviews_text:
For the grand total of absolutely nothing (after purchasing the touch) you will have one of the best experiences the rift has to offer. Although there may be less content here than I would have liked, what is there is extremely fun and for free I can't complain at all. 

If you have the touch you owe it to yourself to play this game. If you don't have a touch and have space, you really need to invest in these controllers and play this game.

If only all VR games were this polished. Truly an excellent game with a great movement system as well as interesting, fresh and exciting gameplay mechanics that feel awesome to execute. This game is VR done right and is a great blueprint for others to give us deeper and more extensive experiences.

Emptying both pistols into robots approaching from all sides, then throwing them aside and grabbing two shotguns from your back to blast the ones that made it close to you, all the while dodging incoming bullets. This game blows me away.
This game has a lot of replayability with the ammount of challanges on every level and has great physics and gameplay

The music, style, and story are all fun and lighthearted. This works well to contrast the gameplay which, especially near the end, becomes pretty challenging.
Get touch and enjoy. This is a truly awesome title and a very fun time.

review_title: What VR games should aspire to be like
one_reviews_text:
This game is a high action packed VRFPS mades by the same guys that brought you Gears of War and Unreal Tournament .  You can customize your loadout between two pistols and two heavy guns at a time and you unlock weapon mods through getting highscores and completing bonus objectives.  Easily dozens and dozens of hours of gameplay;  hopefully we'll get to see some free DLC in the future??

TL;DR
A must buy for the Oculus + Touch

review_title: one of the best VR experience ever made
one_reviews_text: The game is incredible. I was expecting a fun game to spend an hour or two on. And boy was I wrong ! It blew my mind, the game is really well written and fun (kind of like Borderland), it is BEAUTIFUL, even on lower specs and the gameplay is precise, dynamic and it is fun. Everything works well together, the pieces gather and in the end we have one of the best VR game.
Love the game but it usually crashes before I can get anywhere.
My go game to for showing first time vr players what the deal with vr is. It's so well optimised, looks great, and is incredibly fun. Get this game, can't pay enough kudos to the devs on this title.

review_title: Best title for the rift so far
one_reviews_text:
This game is awesome! There is not much in the way of a story but the mechanics are so good they outshine every other VR game I've played so far. That said I wouldn't consider it a full length game in the traditional sense (You can beat it 100% in just 4-8 sittings depending on how you game) 
This games makes you feel like a gun-toating robo-badass and is a nice, easy, and clean title to show your friends and family to help validate the hundreds of dollars you spent to be a rift owner ;-)
this is a fun games and even better when its free
it is a great game
Only 3 levels, too short ! but beautiful and fun. One of the best VR game forever !
Best mechanics for VR so far !
This is the game you always wanted to play on VR. Maybe you didn't know, but after playing this game all will become clear.
Just an awesome game with loads of fun and good VR experince.

This game came with my Oculus so I figured it was going to be a crappy give-a-way game like in some other bundles i've had; But hell no it isnt! Started it by accident one day and decided what the hell and I just had to finish it. Great experience and a funny story

This is just an amazing game. you can jump crawl and duck to dodge bullets and is just amazing. only had one bug was a startup issue but was easy to fix i just moved saves in and out of the folder and was fixed it happened when i finished the game anyways

Great game that really helps to show off VR at its best. There is so much going on in the game that takes some getting used to, but it is such fun. I love how I can teleport, move, shoot, and pick things up. Great game!

... I have to say: It is amazing ! I played a lot of Lightning Gun Shooter Games a couple of years ago. But this experience is just great. I even was afraid of falling down the roof tops, when you have to teleport there. The feeling is by far the best i have experienced in a long time, games wise.
Very well made. A lot of ways to fight. It would be cool if there was co-op, more weapons and maps. Looking forward for a sequel
Its the best thing available for VR, super polished and endless fun!
Game is simply amazing!!! A lot of emotions and fun from the gameplay.

review_title: This is why I bought VR
one_reviews_text: Very time crisisish. excellent, cant play enough
This game is some of the most fun i've ever had, i do recommend

the game doesnt start anymore suddenly, what the hell you guys did ????

After update and very good support from Epic all issues solved and works well.
Game is one of my VR best esperiences!
Best VR game at the m oment love it
Awesome :)
Amazing game! very imercive!
This is one of the best VR shooters I've played so far. Its fast paced and the graphics are excellent.
first game i tried and it was awesome! i just need a third sensor:)
Great controls with touch, great visuals, flawless framerate, and loads of fun. This is a must have game for VR.
the game not install

Amazingly fun game instantly makes me think back to classic arcades with how much fun i have way back when
BUT! the game crashes on 1-2 and no progression is available until that level is beaten so mods are a requirement in order to play the other levels past 1-1 and 2-1

Robo Recall represents everything VR strives to be in its current implementation. Excellent locomotion options and incredibly fun gameplay.

As someone who feels sick quite easily in VR titles, this game gives me absolutely no motion sickness.
One of the very best VR experiances yet! Besides a lack of 'levels' to play on (9 in total), this is a very cool game.
Great Game, A Must Own.
This game has amazing attention to detail which really sets it apart from other shooting games. Its got all the elements needed for an amazing VR game. Raises the bar up pretty good.

This is pure fun. Want to beat a robot to death with it's own arm after ripping it off from it's body, then throw aforementioned arm at an explosive spider bot in midair whilst pulling out a shotgun from your back, shooting that sneaky one that tried to go around your side?

You can do all that. Go play it. It's fun!
please help

This game is now my favorite game to play. It's the most fun I've had in a game in a very long time. It runs perfectly, is very responsive, and the gameplay is amazing. Everyone who enjoys VR must have this.
This is so cool just think of this in real life ripping robots head,legs,hands even blocking bullets as you hold a robot this game is so good so i rate it 5/5! keep up the good work!

I play it all of the time now and if it ever needs something extra I add another mod to use and it becomes even more fun! All in all it is an amazing game and a must play for anyone who can handle it!
good
Its an amazing game. Great graphics.
You almost feel like Neo when he enters the bank lobby and takes out 100+ soldiers.... Wow
The game used to crash for me, but the new update fixed it and it's probably the best one I've tried yet.

This is an incredible shooter, but it's so much more than that.

Sure, you can pull twin triple-barreled shotguns from your back and blast a robot in the face. 

But you can *also* pick that robot up, use it's body to block bullets, rip it's arms off, and then *use* those arms to beat a second robot into pieces.

And those are just two of the *boring* ways to recall a defective robot.

So far the best Oculus Rift title I've played during this Summer of Rift event. As a new user, this is THE way to first experience VR. Excellent graphics, audio, controls, and gameplay. Need more experiences like this!

Over all this is an amazing and fun experience.

In the meantime it had written massive amounts of data to the log file in the directory structure under Appdata\Local.

I've been waiting for VR ever since I was a kid.  Now its here and although this is the first iteration (Rift for me), I am not at all disappointed.  Sure it'll take time for things to improve, but, Robo Recall makes my investment worth it.  I've played a few other FPSes but this one takes the cake.  Graphics is top notch.  I like the storyline and the in-game physics work really well.  Teleporting seems to work in this title and doesn't break the immersion.  Once you accept that in Robo Recall's world tech is more advanced that what we're used to today, its easy to embrace even what could be argued as flaws (which I won't go over).  I like the game and I play as often as I can.  Finished it a few times... but its still good.  On top of everything, I like the voice-overs for the characters in play.  Great job guys.  This game is a benchmark for others... hands down.  No gripes here.  I can't wait to see what you'll cook up next.  Keep 'em coming, better and better.

review_title: The Best Introduction To VR Shooters
one_reviews_text: Robo Recall is the single greatest VR shooter to be released to the Oculus Rift. This is the game I show my friends, and family to blow their minds! Amazing job Epic! This is simply the epidimy of shooters.

Robo Recall Is a hell a lot of fun. Combines the fighting of super hot and the speed of space pirates. All and all a must have for vr. While it is still is a phase of crashing the game proves that Vr can provide a feel and type of game play you can't get on PC.

review_title: Best VR title I've played, hands down
one_reviews_text: This game is exactly what a VR shooter should be, combat is fast paced and enemies come from every direction, but you never feel out-matched once you master the controls. The fact that all enemies are robots and there's no blood or gore should make parents happy, but doesn't detract from the satisfaction of grabbing them and yanking a limb or head right off should they wander too close. The guns are distinct enough to make them all fun, and experimenting with the different mods you can put on them is also neat. A teleport and bullet time mechanic make you feel downright god-like as you tear through crowds of bots, shooting them, pulling them apart, throwing them into each other, catching their bullets and pitching them back at them, or playing ping-pong with your guns as the paddles. Only wish there were more missions and co-op multiplayer over LAN and the internet. This game feels like being inside an old school arcade shooter like Area 51 or Time Crisis, only much, much better. If you are playing around other people or doing demo's, make sure you go into your device settings and turn on audio mirroring so the audience can hear what's going on (they'll have a limited view of what the headset wearer is seeing on the monitor). A final note: if you have 3 + sensors it's even better, you don't get the annoying "face front" message popping up if you end up turned around.
Brilliant game full stop, even better for being VR

review_title: Fantastic example of how to VR right
one_reviews_text: Robo Recall is the go to game for how to do VR "right". From the second you enter the game with its upbeat music and color scheme (no streaking) you feel charged and energetic to kick some robot a$$. The game features all the best attributes from Bullet Train and expands it 10 fold. The controls feel natural and the teleport "turn and face" ability is the best use of it I've seen so far. I love playing this title and gives devs a great point of reference for developing great experiences on this ever growing platform! BRAVO!
Amazing game, graphics and play style. Just needs more levels, even if they are paid.

No tracking issues. Good shooting, nice slowmo. Even the blink mechanics is made not to dissapoint those, who love traditional locomotion. It lacks weapons in default installation, and some moments are not obvious from the very beginning. But the game is good, and a must have.

review_title: By far the best VR experience
one_reviews_text: I have played tons of VR games, there's a few great ones out there, but none as good as Robot Recall. The controls are super intuitive. The fast pace makes it so you are never bored and always leaves you craving for more challenges. The story is not very complex, but its good enough that it doesn't feel like just a tech demo, it has enough dialogs to keep you engaged. It also has a 90s retro feel that adds an extra charm. If you are going to buy only 1 VR game make sure its this one.

this was free and anyone with touch controllers should download it.  The only downside is it is not very long, like most VR out there its not a full game, more of a tech demo.  But it comes very very close to being a full game.  AS much as they spent making it, i do not know why it was not finished out to a 40+hour game.  The controls are perfect, the graphics are amazing, the frames are buttery smooth, this game had me dashing and turning all around my room and i was breaking a sweat playing it. A+ devs. NOw lets get a longer full game and i would gladly pay 60 bucks for it.

review_title: Hampered a bit by teleportation only
one_reviews_text: Really like the game, but the teleportation totally ruins the experience for me. Why do developers insist on only making games for people who get sick from VR? Especially for this great a game, it is a real shame. PLEASE make some movement options. I'd prefer a free movement scheme of course. UPDATE: New patch allows for you to still use the teleportation directional arrow while 360, which is awesome. Upped my rating to 4 out of 5 stars. Things I'd like for the game to be perfect (besides free locomotion of course): 1. Add back the arrow on the floor circle showing me what is towards the front of my play area. I have a fairly narrow play area, so despite having 4 sensors I still want to be facing forward as much as possible, to avoid hitting a closet behind me. 2. Allow us to disable the scoreboard on the monitor entirely. This is useful for streaming on Twitch for example. In such a situation, I feel the scoreboard is in the way. Would be much better to dedicate the full window to actual gameplay.

review_title: Felt Like I was in a Fight for my Life!
one_reviews_text: First time I've ever felt like it was real. I actually felt like I needed to shoot them to survive. It was a crazy feeling!!! I kept screaming and everyone else in the house was asleep, so I had to stop playing for the night lol.
overrated
For anyone else having this happen (game won't load after update), I was able to fix my issue by deleting the OdinSettings.sav file and letting the game recreate it.

review_title: It is a good FPS and free
one_reviews_text: Free so? and the shooting is great
Right after there was a mandatory driver update for Oculus this game stopped working. Finally! after another update the game is working again.
A supremely satisfying shooter that represents the best VR has to offer... to date. My only gripe is that it's pretty short, but like a great arcade game, I don't mind treading back through for more.

review_title: This game made me feel like I'm robo cop
one_reviews_text: So glad i bought the touch and it gave me this free game.  WHAT A GEM.  At first i thought it was just gonna be another boring shooter, but playing this in VR along with the game mechanics turn this into anything but boring.  I can't remember the last time i play same level over and over in a game just to try out different ways you can kill the same thing.  THANK YOU Oculus for bundling this to the already good price of the touch!!!

This game is the god of Oculus games.
I want to smack anyone who lowers stars because of locomotion after everything these guys put into this game and how it runs so smooth and looks so freaking amazing. Im running on a r290 graphics card and a 9590 AMD processor and I have had 0 problems. Iam getting the Ryzen 1800x and soon Vega and I cant wait to crank this up.  I dont think it can even get better but Im running the game on default low settings right now and its blowing my mind all over again like when I first tried Oculus VR. 
No 360 roomscale? I for one do not have a 3rd sensor. Also I was really glad to see that message for once telling you your facing away from sensors. I dont want to ruin my cables a second time by having them becoming twisted over time. Maybe they can have it turned off in options for those who dont care.
No locomotion? I was upset for about a minute and then I got used to it and the game is a blast. Besides they can add it later. Right now its the most fluid and amazing looking game thats really fun. And its freaking free... all that hard work these guys did and people are there complaining and lowering stars because they are cry babies... Dont be fooled this game has bruises on its behind because it really is BAD A*S*S*!
**I love it and would spank again!
BEST

review_title: Intially it was awesome not so much now.
one_reviews_text: After being able to play for like a week when i first installed the game. i was not able to start the game after continually loads on my glasses and says, " it is taking too long to load, if the problem persists please check it on your pc." unfixable and unplayable at the moment, but it was good for the little time i did actually play it. i am able to play other oculus rift titles but this one seems to be stuck in a limbo, keep talking and nobody explodes loads fine and works as well as Arizona Sunshine.

Last update 1.3 has ruined the game. Stops the screen and can not be used. Several times I installed, deleted files on the system and does not help. Sometimes it takes a while, sometimes the menu does not appear.
Worked until the third level then stopped loading. Tried re-installing the game, updating the drivers, and even resetting oculus. Nothing is working to resolve the problem.

review_title: One of the best VR games on the moment
one_reviews_text:
For me, this is one of the best VR game by the moment, the most inmersive and competitive one
PROS:
-Online rankings
-Very polished combat mechanics
-In game progress
-Duration
-Good graphic style 
CONS:
-As a developer, when I see the teleport in a game I see a "prototype" of the VR movement mechanic, It makes the game uncomfortably if you play more than one level on a row.
In my opinion we haven´t seen a true solution for that problem yet
Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again later. (OVR67870661)

This game makes having my VR headset a blast! I had some friends try it, after cleaning of course, and they loved it. I got it working on my HTC Vive through Revive and it works great!!! Hand gestures are not as smooth when using Revive but the gameplay is spectacular!!! If you have a VR headset, Vive or Oculus, give this game a go. Worth every cent.

By far the best FPS for VR! Stunning Graphics, hot action an some nice Humor! Shoot at Robots, catch them, tear them appart for multiplyer. Sweeeeeet!
However since the last update, its not working anymore.
Sad!
Update!
If the game will "hang" on start, one can delete the "RoboRecall" folder in the Users "AppData" directory.
c:\Users\$USERNAME$\AppData\Local\RoboRecall\
But this will also delete your saves.
The game didn't launch anymore with the last update but deleting the profil save files (not the install ones) did the trick for me, I just had to do the game again :)
Crashes on level 2-1 no matter what I try.
a must have for VR alot of fun

review_title: Nice job from Epic games and Oculus
one_reviews_text:
You should really start VR with this game, it's a genre changing game that immerses you inside a world of robot shooting and smashing.
Would be great if they would let you to play your own soundtrack from spotify while playing.
Better tutorials to tell you how you can grab bullets and throw back, smash robots and use them as a sheild or weapon, and some other cool tricks that really helps to the gameplay.

Robo Recall is simply one of the finest crafted and produced VR games to date. I've read in a few different places that this is the most expensive VR creation to date and it shows. The presentation, graphics, models, enviornments, are all at the top of the pack in terms of their competition. Even if this game wasn't free it would be a no brainer decision to purchase. Thank you Oculus studios and EPIC for an amazing game!
wont install :(
Programmers better step up their game quick. This one sets the bar high!  It's a blast, funny, and makes other games pale in comparison.  Batman VR is crap next to this one.

review_title: This game made me buy the Rift.
one_reviews_text:
After going to my friends house to go on the Rift and going on loads of games, I still wasnt finding a good enough reason to get the rift. For some reason this was the LAST game he showed me, and I was blown away.
A week after playing it I bought a PC, 1070gtx, the rift and a extra sensor. 
A month after having it all and playing other games (both in Steam VR and Oculus store) this is still in the top two best games I own, being in joint first with Superhot VR which I also recommend highly. 
FREE WITH TOUCH CONTROLERS but I still would have paid 50% more than its asking price no problem.
Was a pain to get it to work , but great was it was running .

review_title: Best VR game at the moment
one_reviews_text:
I knew when i first tried the Bullet Train demo, that if it ever was gonna be a full game, it would be amazing.

Well this is it. One of the most polished experiences i have ever seen on my Rift. This game is so awesome to play, and incredible funny.

I enjoy ripping robots apart and juggling around with them. The game has a very "arcadey" feel to it and even though there isn't that many levels, you will want to keep replaying them to complete all the challenges and to climb the leader boards.

I got my Oculus the same time this game came out so I didnt play many titles. This was the first game I played with the touch, and I wish I had got the chance to play all the previous games first. This game sets the bar to high to the point where every other shooter I play, just doesnt have that robo recall feel. Dead and Buried is in its own rights as well. This game is so good to me, I wont even complain about teleport.

review_title: The best VR game out there so far
one_reviews_text:
Everything is perfect here.

Performance - 980ti without hiccups, never 45, always 90fps.

Graphics - they are just awesome.

Action - it's bulletstorm on steroids, except YOU are the boundary of creativity, since YOU dicide what to pick up and throw, how to shoot, what to shoot and such.

Gameplay - FPS rollercoaster with hilarious action. BEST controls, BEST teleport implementation, BEST mechanics out there.

Sound - awesome.

The only downside - only 9 levels. However, with challenges, it gets far more gameplay packed, as you try to achieve them all. Mod support is awesome, however I would love to get DLCs with more areas and more levels.

P.S.: OH THE INTERNET. I TOUCHED THE INTERNET: CAT VIDEOS, VIDEOS, MEEEEEEMES

Teleportation is something that needs to ONLY be an option. You put joysticks on your touch controllers for a reason USE THEM! This game is also not made for 360 setups because whenever you teleport you end up facing the wrong way.
ahmazing, this game gets you moving, swatting away bullets, twisting and turning waving your arms around like some ymca class. The soundtrack and cheese lines are fantastic, i love this game
my body isnt ready! but my wallet is oh wait it's free!!! Thanks Oculus and Epic team!

This is one hell of a rollercoaster ride while it lasts. You teleport from point to point, dual wield weapons and blow up everything around you. There is a ton of fun in finding creative ways to 'recall' the runaway robots. 

But there is also not that much variation on offer. Once you get into the flow of blowing bots to that great big assembly-line in the sky, you will notice the same scenarios repeat endlessly. 

For quick sessions, there is nothing better than Robo Recall. But this is not the big meaty full VR game we all need.

review_title: wow at least it shows what vr is capable
one_reviews_text: The Graphics are superb, the Gameplay is fun, it has some smaller bugs like not even get both wweapons out of the holster but at least its fun,  i love that game, and its free, but in my inside i wished a title like bullet train as it was designed i would pay for this i hope epic take that feedback and create such a game because robot recall showed its possible to do something similar.

review_title: The Best VR Game Out There At The Moment
one_reviews_text:
I thought it would take YEARS for someone to come up with a game that could beat Elite Dangerous in terms of awesomeness but Epic have done it with Robo Recall. VERY satisfying to play and whilst on paper the game isn't very long there's LOADS of stuff to do to complete the game 100%.

And if that wasn't good enough Epic have made the game 100% moddable which means we could end up seeing new content coming to this game regularly for YEARS.

It's easy to play but difficult to master and the humour is excellent throughout. This is $10m well spent by Oculus and yet another awesome free game too. They're really knocking it out of the park in terms of top quality free content - Lucky's Tale, Herobound Spirit Champion, Farlands, First Contact, Toy Box, Quill, Medium, Dead & Buried and now Robo Recall. All for nowt. Outstanding.
Its not working since the latest update just a blank screen and has to be force closed please can you sort this out, Robo recall is one of the main reasons I bought Oculus Rift over the Vive!
review_feedback: kizloc, Would you please send me a copy of your OdinSettings.sav and OdinSave*.sav file. We have not been able to reproduce this bug but believe the key may be within the sav. It's in C:\Users\%username%\AppData\Local\RoboRecall\Saved\SaveGames. Email me at tommy.jacob@epicgames.com Thanks!

one_reviews_text:
I just recently got my rift+touch and saw that this is free for touch. Iam blown away to be honest. 

1. Great Graphics. It really looks amazing
2. Best controls. It just works perfectly
3. Great sound and Soundtrack. It is just so much fun to tear apart an army of robots while listening to the soundtrack that motivates me so much.
4. Fun arcady Game for a quick game between other things.

If you got Oculus Touch this is a must have

For those who cannot launch game any more, I had the same problem. Then I decided to install it in another hard drive, with windows 10 OS, and with minimal other programs, and now it works fine, even if the delay  to start it is still a bit long.
I hope it can help you, it's the only solution I found !!
A game truly worth  the use of the word awesome, inspiring awe.

This is really a fun title, however, it needs some story and more immersion. I do not feel like I am part of the game, I feel like a mindless drone ripping apart other mindless drones. Though the Bruce Campbell throwbacks are pretty nice +1 star for that.
Best Vr game and graphic this time !!
I just love everything about this game. Must have for everyone with VR-headset. :)

Would be a 5 star game but the lack of true 360 degree support absolutely ruins it for me. When you teleport but you are not facing the forward direction the game expect it changes your direction for you. This is madening and leads to poor gaming performance since you have to get your bearing all over again after each teleport. If they fix this soon I will update my review but I find it ridiculous that this is forced on people with no way to turn it off. Especially when room scale is playable with only 2 sensors so anyone with touch can use 360 in a 7x7 area with no issues in my experiance.

I loved to play it. It was like a full content game like other computer games. It is unfortunately a little bit short but nevertheless, awesome graphics, low story (but funny) and its so satisfying to cut of body parts of the robots :DD

This game is incredible! I keep coming back and playing it more to try to get all of the achievements, and it feels exponentially more fun each time. I hope to see more modes for this game. Co-op, multiplayer, etc...
This is a wonderful game that my hubby and I enjoy! It can keep you entertained for hours. This is definitely going in our top fav games to play.

Im not one to persecute a game as good as this. BUT personally im fed up with no proper stick movement. This I understand seems to be oculus rules as in not to implement smooth movement due to motion sickness.. A majority of people who play on rift DO NOT GET motion sickness. You also can get over motion sickness by training your brain to accept smooth movement in vr. Ive tried and tested smooth movement titles and im telling you its 10x better with at least the OPTION to enable it. if it wasnt for this one thing really pissing me off this review would have been 10 stars not 3!!!!!!

Trying to download the update but keeps telling me to visit Oculus support, get to the support and it has loads of help to click on, but nothing for my scenario, WHY can't they just put a box to type in what you want to ask, instead of presenting you with a list of garbage that you don't need.

SO HOW DO I GET TO DOWNLOAD THE UPDATE ????????????????????????????????

By far one of the best VR games in the industry right now. It's a great feeling to rip a robots head off and toss it aside or rip its arms off and beat it to death. This is THE game to play when you need to blow off some steam.

review_title: So fun and dynamic! (a bit short)
one_reviews_text: Amazing how this game is dynamic, we really feel in the battle field. Graphics are awesome, gun fight are so crazy, I couldn't recommand more.
So fun. Just so fun. I love everything about it. Please make another!

- 3D rendering very impressive
- good gameplay, extensible with mods
- VR immersion UX good (no discomfort at all as it's teleport thing)
- Teleport widget is the best ever seen: it becomes second nature: it's PERFECT

game won't load any more>>>>.!!!!!
does the makers read this and can you fix it ??????????????????????????? good game b4 you broke it
If you bought Touch, you have this game and already know it is probably the best shooter on the store. Everything about it is polished. Fantastic experience, highly recommended.
This is one of the few truly 'polished' games.  The immersion is awesome, the controls very precise and intuitive.  It's a fast paced arcade type style, but they've done it beautifully.

This game has it all - fast-paced action, quirky humor (very Portal-like), clever intuitive controls, great graphics.

Entirely comfortable if you get VR sickness - I'm quite susceptible, but had no problem playing for hours. Though, the constant gripping of guns does make for some hand cramps.

review_title: Game is not loading with update...
one_reviews_text: Same as another user. After updating the game no longer loads. I have uninstalled and reinstalled with out any luck.
I have played this for hours on end and it never gets old!
This game is absolutely the best VR game I have played. The graphics and animations are beautiful, the sound effects are great and the game play is a lot of fun!

This is a game you and friends can spend a few hours (or many) playing and having a blast.  It doesn't make you nauseous despite being able to move from location to location.  Beating some of the side challanges adds to the fun.  You can use your own guns or hands to beat the robots, or you can simply strip the enemy of their guns.

Best single player experience FPS on the Oculus hands down! At first the "always-frontfacing teleport" was wierd but when you get used to it it actually makes more sense than any other teleport that tries too hard to force room scale spinning around on players.
If they make this game COOP multiplayer it would completely obliviate any other VR shooter ever made.

This is without a doubt the best VR game produced so far! Great visuals, music and sound effects to rival any top title and most of all outstanding implementation of VR touch. Gameplay is easy to get started with but has extreme depth that takes 10's of hours to even begin to master! Because of the immersion you want to replay levels again and again. I dont have any issues with the teleportation movement (it is well implemented), but it would be good to have a free motion options as well though I would personally most likely stick with teleportation until I get a VR "walking" platform. Awesome work and great showcase for the Rift and what VR is capable of!

If you own Touch controllers and haven't played this game, shame on you.

If you (somehow) don't own Touch controllers, they are an eligant expression of VR design and this game applies them perfectly.

VR presents a new challenge for expression action-in-motion for tense, tactical, exhilarating moments. Strafing doesn't work in VR -- at least not for now. We need a new paradigm.

This game hits every new VR note so well that it almost stuns you into accepting it as the thing to just copy again and again. 

Hopefully not -- but it is well worth praise and shows that VR is only limited by how far designers can imagine and how well controls can adapt to support new motion. 

If you need to sell your friends (or team) on how fun VR can be, this is the game to use.

I was kinda hesitant to buy a the Touch as I was planning to only use the rift for Elite Dangerous, and racing simulators. After playing this game all I can say I am very happy with the purchase and my VR time will include quite a bit of this game. It was free, but I'd buy it in a hearbeat. 10/10 Would juggle again. :)

But teleportation only :/
Please don't force people who don't get sick into using some subpar movement mechanic.
Just add the option for both, like serious sam first encounter did.
This will be the epitome of epitomes if you add locomotion !!

Someone gave this game 1 star because of no 360 degree gameplay and this just isnt true.Getting faultless 360 gameplay on my 3 sensor setup with the exception of teleporting which orients to front facing which doesnt bother me.The game graphics are superb and the gameplay progresses nicely with a steady increase in opponent types and weapons.5 Stars just doesnt seem enough for this title.

review_title: This is the game that made me buy Oculus
one_reviews_text: I palyed this game at a demo and in just a few minutes was sold on getting Oculus Rift.  The touch controlers are awesome and this game really sets the standard of what VR games should look and feel like.

This game is a whole lot of fun, I would like to have the option for free locomotion instead of being forced to teleport, I know some people can get from it so it's good to include teleport as well but I would like the option to choose between the two.  Very creative game, it has a great arcade feel to it and the guns feel pretty responsive.  Job well done keep up the great work!
I have to say this is one of the best games on the rift right now.  Very polished and extremely fun.

Wow, Love it ! Art style, Graphics, Game play & humour are all excellent just what I hoped a VR shooter would be, I can see VR heaven. I tried the loco Mod but it made me feel very woozy & im Ard as nails :) Great job by the developer & Oculus keep em coming like this.
Agent 33 (Deceased)
This is my favorite vr game right now and its finally a full game that you dont have to worry about if you play for a hour its gonna be over!
It's great.

This game is so good, I’d even pay for it (sheesh, don't tell Oculus). The game is fun and it makes me want to replay to get better. However, it is a bit short and repetitive. You replay the same missions with better weapons you unlock to get a better score… but there is only so much you can take. Having a couple of survival maps would be great. … also as a side note, if you replay the same missions over and over, having to hear and wait on the same stuff is exhausting. The boss makes a speech, again, can’t skip. Another count down “Get ready, 3, 2, 1” … let’s just get on with it… let us skip speaches and such once we beat a mission and come back to it.
My favorite game bar none. 5 star all the way

...but this is the worst yet. The orientation arrow is relative to ABSOLUTE forward, not your CURRENT orientation, so if you're facing right and you teleport with the arrow facing South, you'll end up looking West. TOTALLY IDIOTIC.

But forget teleport anyway. Smooth move option! Seriously! I refuse to play any more teleport games. Period. Arizona Sunshine was fixed to add motion, Obduction was fixed to add motion...the list goes on. One star. Fix it.
This game is simply amazing. Its full of humor and action. Just be sure you have a towel to wipe the sweat off your face for the final level!

Robo Recall is an acrade style wave shooter done with humour, style and a ton of polish. The high production values delivered by an experienced dev like Epic elevate this offering head and shoulders above the many games that populate this overcrowded VR genre. Life is simple as a Robo Recall agent, see a robot, rip it's head off, throw it into the face of another while blasting it's buddy to pieces with a shotgun all before snatching a rocket out of the air and hurtling it back at the enemy. That sounds like lots of fun and it is. The only drawn back is it is short, there are currently 9 levels, but with Epic allowing mods, new content is sure to follow. Add to that the new 360 patch and the fact you can download mods to change the locomotion style if you dont want to teleport, there is no reason not to get this gem of a VR title. Great!

review_title: Best Triple A VR game experience atm!
one_reviews_text: But too short of game dynamics, mechanics and storyplay for a Triple A VR full game. This is the closest your gonna get to even having a small pinch of taste of what a VR Triple A game experience would be compared to every other VR game on the market.
