It's a shame it was so short in story-mechanics-dynamism but I can't complain when they agreed to give it free with the Touch, indeed, this game is the reason why you WILL buy the touch in the first place!

VR shooter how it should be.
Would be nice to have feedback on touch controllers - it's the only thing this game needs!

In the beggening I was thinking wow this game is easy. It's fun but easy. However the last two missions unlocked ramp up the dificulty to make it a challenge. I wish there were more levels like those two but im sure when i play back through and try to get more of the stars ill find a decent challenge. graphics were awsome. there were some points in the story scenes when the robots turned to face me that I feared for my life. Very immersive excieting game, for free its a no brainer.

Hands down the most fun I've had yet with the touch controllers, just scraping by Arizona Sunshine for my #1 touch game to play. The graphics, gameplay, controls and mechanics are all top notch. The campaign while short offers a lot of replayablility due to the leveling system in place, the more you kill rewards you with stars which can in turn be used to unlock weapon upgrades. There is also fixed attributes you unlock as you level that will make getting more points and kills easier the higher in level you get. Each of the 9 levels has leaderboards and challenges attached, again adding to the replay value. I got this game for free, but if I had to pay for it, would do so in a heartbeat. Lastly, it supports mods and there is a website via ingame that you can visit to download the mod creator so you can play others mods or create your own (going to test here soon). 

Overall scoring: A+++ 10/10. 

Final Thoughts: Hope they add more to it overtime, maybe another zone and some more weapons but if not, game is still golden. The only complaint I have, is no achievements, again maybe something that can be added. 

Hope this helps! See ya! Thanks Epic!

Good, and relatively long storyline for a free game. Excellent graphics running off Unreal Engine. Personally, one of the best arcady First Person shooters Available. Awesome job yet again Epic Games!

review_title: Nothing comes close to how fun this is!
one_reviews_text: Addicting!

Super polished and amazing fun! 
I keep coming back to this every day no matter how tired I am and it actually works pretty well while sitting. 
Grabing robots and tearing their head of is super satisfying and I love the random comments from the robots when you hurt them. 
One in particular that I really love is when you grab them and they say "Why did they add handles!?" 
10/10 ne of the best looking and most fun games I have ever played in the Rift.

The game is for free and it is so fun 
good job epic games!
cool gimick i guess

review_title: Simply the best game available for VR
one_reviews_text: Gorgeous, fun game play, free with touch. Oculus and Epic have outdone themselfs with this.

How does a demo be more fun than full games!? now this demo is a full game!!!! Elite Dangerous is my favorite VR game but this might replace it. I threw my pistol at a bot that was jumping through the air at me, when it bounced i shot it with my other gun and it died in flight. WHAAAAAAAAATTTTTTTT!!!!

review_title: It`s such a nice game but teleportation
one_reviews_text:
This is just my opinion yours may vary and im 100% cool with that.
I know there are many people out there with motion sickness and yes i fully understand why they need teleport. I don't have the problem of motion sickness at all and for me (and many others) teleportation is just a no go.
I just hope they do a locomotion update like Arizona Sunshine did. It cant be that hard to implement i mean you can teleport anywhere in the map so why cant you just walk there.
The Game itself is so polished from graphics to animation to sound. I wish games like Onward would be like that :(

Please make more games exactly like this one, or add more content, I am willing to pay bigtime, because all the other games cannot compare to robo recall in smoothness of controls and balanced gameplay!!!

Don't change too much -- this game has got all the basics right!

This is totally mindblowing. And it's also a bit scary!! I mean, my heart is racing when the robots close in. I'm thinking I should be fearing for my life, but it's just a game. Crazy how the Rift is blurring the line between reality and imagination. This is a shinning example of that success.
A bit repetitive at times, but it is definitely good fun!

review_title: Best fun game i played in ages!
one_reviews_text: It's only arcade shooter, but an awesome one! The acuracy and sense of scale is stunning. This game will set standars in years to come. I can't wait for game like Mass Effect with this sort of mechanics. Teleporting was a bit awkward at the beginning, but after you get used to it, simply brilliant. This game shows the true potential of rift + touch.

This is the first game, why people MUST have the Oculus and Touch Controllers!! I never have seen something sooo beautiful!!
The graphics are superb!! Tracking is perfect!! And the Gameplay ROCKS!!! Its the very best game so far!! Why cant more games be like that???? And why did we have to wait so long for a game that shows, what VR is meant to be??? :-) GREAT WORK GUYS!!! THUMBS UP!!!

review_title: Best Vr Game on oculus store
one_reviews_text: Ive played  the Showdown Movie,Bullet Train and now Roborecall all better than the one before. Superhot is my 2nd because I beat the game in a day, but this took me days to finish. I'd have payed more than Gta 5 to get this game.

incredibly beautiful game !!!
very high resolution !!

review_title: Thanks for that epic game, Epic Games!
one_reviews_text:
By far the best game in the Oculus Store. This title is so immersive it makes you completely forget your surroundings. Graphics are top notch and the controls are insanely good! + you get it for 0 bucks. Def a AAA title! 
Cant wait for more Epic Games releases!
So much better than I expected!
Too cool.  Now that is seems stable it is a great app.  Room scale makes it a lot more fun.  With the latest updates I have not had it crash.

review_title: Amazing Title - A showcase for VR
one_reviews_text: I'll say the obvious; a great game with phenominal graphics, amazing gameplay, and fantastic sound.  I've played it several times through, and never get tired of it.  I can't wait to see more of what this studio has to offer!

Everyone I've showed it to just instantly falls in love with this game. It's campaign is short but the graphics and gameplay (collecting cool upgrades for your weapons, getting all the star achievements, ripping robots heads off etc.) make you want to play it over and over. This is the only game I come back to and think about when not in VR. And the intro is so good. Let's hear it for...ROOOOBOOOOOO RECALLLLLLLLL!
Before the update this game was awesome.  Now I can't get past the loading screen.  Will update review if fixed.
Graphics are just, GORGEOUS, the tracking is perfect, the game fun is just absolut fun (if you like shooter of course), guns upgradable,  it's really a nice game to get into.
The best VR game so far in my opinion.
With the update to add 3 sensor 360 tracking this has made a great game an amazing VR game. Hopefully the first of many great titles to come.

review_title: WOW THIS IS WHAT VR IS ABOUT
one_reviews_text: i've loads of these games for the oculus and this is a def!!!!!! but does need to be longer only because i enjoyed so much ;)
This Shooter game is meant to be designed perfectly for VR. It makes much fun to shoot these robots. Highly recommended :)
The game is fantastic and all but after the recent update it won't launch. I look in Task Manager and it always says "Not Responding" as soon as it opens.

Hard to belive it is free?  This is better then some of the pay games!  I may be spoiled but I can not get  used to the teleport to move.  Let the player choose to use the teleport or regular movement with the thumbstick.  Teleport should be used as a "Jump" so you can run around like normal and teleport as a quick escape.  I feel like I would play more and do better if I could walk and run as well as teleport.  To make it harder make the teleport function have to charge for 2 or 3 secconds
This games is easily the best VR game I have played. Sets the standards high!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DfucrK-YVk8
My Thoughts:
Simply Awesome... Out of 60+ VR titles in my library, this is the one I keep coming back to play! I can't sleep at night becuase I want to get up and play the dam thing!
Super fun, fast paced shooter. Easily the best game I have played so far, just get it.
I love the game but the only problem is once I reach 10 percent the game crashes and I have played the game over and over again but it always crashes.

review_title: It mixes multiple elements together well
one_reviews_text:
Take Ratchet: Gladiator. Make it even more of an arcade shooter than before. Put it in VR. Shoot robots in the face and work for a soulless corporation.

I really want more VR experiences like this. It's fun, fast, responsive, and looks great. The humor and arcade-y elements are also a good bonus. It's a great experience all around and is an amazing free game for an already "worth it" purchase.
wtf

Booooom Headshot xD
Bought this game at the secound Day with my rift and touch and had fun all night!!! Maybe there are not that much Levels but i already saw nice Mods i wanna try...so.

Fantastic game. Stylistically evocative of Epic (Megagames) classics. The moment to moment gameplay has incredible options and depth, this game isn't just a shooter like Raw Data. The graphics are also stunning, probably the best looking VR game.

review_title: Solid game for current VR technology
one_reviews_text: This game is a blast to play and is the best "officially supported" VR title I've played and you certainly cant beat free so kudos to that. It is fun to see the variety of ways each indivual can enjoy the game. I personally like ripping the robots heads off but my little brother likes to hold his pistol sidways and rapid fire like a gangster or throw crabs like a football just to see how far they'll go. The only thing I dont like are the stupid arrows telling me to turn around to face the sensors. there is a positioning line on the ground circle that will work just fine for me if I start having issues and need to readjust. Ultimately I see this game as having a lot of future potential as well if paired with an omni directional treadmill and haptic feedback shirt to untether from the standard teleport movement and make it easier to determine where you're getting shot from. This being said though, add in an option to remove the position arrows and I'll have zero complaints.

The experience is unbelievable. I felt like I was in the game and the music/sound effects in the background made it even better. The graphs and scenarios look amazing. It was the first game a downloaded that I actually provide that VR experience one is looking for.  However, I wish they had more levels or challenges rather than just a few. Particularly, the ability of different challenges within the few levels in the game. Also, some sort of battle mode could be fun.

review_title: Like being inside a 90's arcade game!
one_reviews_text:
This reminds me so much of the old beat-em-ups like Double Dragon or Final Fight, where you just mow through tons of enemies and disposable weapons.  Except you're IN the game this time.  It's light-hearted and doesn't take itself seriously, which just makes it that much more fun.  While your personal skill and aim are absolutely important, there are also unlockable upgrades and a level-up feature that grants permanent buffs the longer you play.  So some of those "How can that be possible?!" challenges on the stage become attainable the more you play.  And there are just so many ways to play!  Long-range sniping, close-range shotguns, melee attacks, deflecting bullets with your bare hands.  Or go for total brutality: Grab a bot, rip its head off, yank off a leg, and use the torso as a shield and the leg as a club.

Movement is done via teleportation, which has its pros and cons.  It's comfortable for people prone to motion sickness.  However it's very easy to get turned around, especially if you tend to turn in place in the real world.  It only takes a second or so to reorient yourself, but in a fast-paced game like this, that can be problematic.  Still, with practice, you get used to it.

This is easily the best VR game I've played to date.  It's not gimmicky at all, doesn't get stale after an hour, and really utilizes the VR environment and touch controls to their full potential.
This is what I have been waiting for all my life. Please make more of this.

This title is the reason i purchased the touch controllers. 
it is a pleasure to play and re play.. 

it reminds of Time Crisis only a million times better. 
even though it was free with the touch controllers its one of few games i would of been happy to part with hard earnt cash.. 

a lot of the other titles out there at the moment are just showcasing VR.. there are no real games out there.. 

in a nut shell buy it if you have to, or purchase the touch controllers even if its only for this game.. worth every single penny..
Top quality VR fun.
Cool game, would recommend it to anyone! :)
Graphics are some of the best ive seen for a VR game and the gameplay is fun. Would be fun if there was co-op multi-player

if you own oculus touch, you need to play this game, absolute fun gameplay and beautiful graphics ! My only complaint is, that there´s no free locomotion. But i guess you can´t really complain because it´s a free game.

Wow, love this game, and it's free!
Thankyou to all that made this happen!. I'm amazed of the graphical presentation and all of the ways you can interact with in it. If this is the begining of cv1. man I'm so looking forward to a full on story driven, amazing looking games in vr to come, with this game showing the ground work of awesome vr, the future looks great! Did I mention it"s Free! sorry for the wall of text, got to get back to smashing a t9's  face against a car door :)

This game is ok. Everything about it is super polished. But somehow its only ok.  I love the arcade game feel of the style. But I want it to be crazier. how about a sword? How about rediculous upgrades instead of the predictable miniscule points based upgrade system. How about a shield? A hammer? A giant robot claw that cuts robots in half? As it is I played the first few levels and have no motivation to play more as it is rinse and repeat.  but its a free game and I shouldn't complain except that is feels like a missed opportunity to do something different.
Fun game that really shows what a VR experience can be like, who knew tearing robots apart could be so much fun!
I am hope this game will get update because at now it is my prefer game ever. I want to spent all my spare time in RoboRecall. Respect for Epic games)))

review_title: That is the future of VR
one_reviews_text: This is the game I was waiting for. Love the concept and the execution.

review_title: chill and super fun, can play for hours!
one_reviews_text: amazing graphics, well done, comfortable to play, and a wild ride!

Excellent VR integration, nice graphics, fluid and dynamic! Best VR game I've tried by far... The teleportation system is a bit desorientating at first but its awesome when you get used to it and it does help reduce motion sickness. Only downside of this game is that its quite short, hope there'll be more levels coming!!

FPS focused with interesting guns and dodgeable bullets.  And some neat hand-based grappling, thumping, blocking too!  Open environment you see and move in.  Not quite Portal level humor, but close.  Just difficult enough.  A great VR game to let loose in!

Unlike some reviewers I love the way teleportation is done, the instant rotation makes it fun to teleport behind a robot and tear it to bits.

I have only one minor complaint: the guns feel like they point slightly downwards unless I keep my finger on the very tip of the trigger. Still, an excellent shooter with a visceral meelee system, it'd be worth it even if it wasn't free!

review_title: This is how games should be for VR
one_reviews_text: Awseme game! And a complete one, not just expensive an DEMO!

so sad... i can play all the rift games except for this one. Won't start. Keeps loading. Tells me it is taking too long then to check it on my computer.  Waste of several gigs of space! I really want to play this. Sigh......
review_feedback: Lavender_Lavender, We're aware of this issue and are releasing a fix near the end of this week. Hang in there!

one_reviews_text: Haven't played a vr game this amazing since chronos.
The best vr game in the market

This game is great! It's exciting yet not too serious. So many ways to play. You could choose to shoot, tear apart or even pingpong back the bullets to the bad robots. 
The teleporting to me is actually good, since I do suffer from motion sickness yet with this teleporting scheme I am totally fine even playing for a long time.

This is one of the best games on the oculus. The fact that its free is just icing on the cake! The gun play is fantastic! Once you learn the controls, it gets really neat. I like the 2 sets of weapons to choose from. 2 from your hips, 2 from your shoulders. And the weapons are customizable. VR really shines with FPS and I want to see more games with awesome weapons. Games like doom and Turok would be awesome in Vr.
Just play it already.

A master class in VR game design, it makes you feel like a super hero and also has gorgeous visuals and quirky humor that doesn't take itself too seriously. Sets the bar crazy high for other game devs and hopefullly we make everyone step up their game. My favorite part is the emergent gameplay that treats interaction like it's own fun sandbox. Grab bullets? Sure. Pull your enemies limb from limb? But of course. Use those limps to bat bullets into the other enemies? Oh hell yeah! Thanks Epic and Oculus for showing up the real future of action gaming.

First of all it's free....so that is something. second, it's a great game...that responds really well. I am awaiting the day the games become great like this but only a bit more serious. For now i have no issues with the arcady and kiddy humour elements in this game. Somehow it manages to capture the coolness of Superhot within it's pretty straightforward concept. 
Teleporting is a major part of the game mechanic and it wortks quite well, despite that i truly hope the people at Oculus are trying to grow to a fps moving kind of concept but this game is a great transition towards that.

review_title: Lets me crave the 100% at this hard one
one_reviews_text:
This game is pretty hard to master but it keeps me motivated!

But whats really missing is another teleportation system that doesn't rotate you for roomscale setup... it gets sometimes really confusing if you have 3+ sensors and turn, then teleport.
Otherwise I hope to see also more content updates.

Man, this is so much fun. Smashing and bashing robots to bits is really satisfactory. Great upgrade mechanism that actually feels like it matters. Thanks Oculus for providing this experience at no cost (well, there's nothing like a free lunch, so I've probably already paid for it when purchasing the Rift+Touch :)).

Ok, so after having the Oculus Rift for a few months now, this is the best overall game so far. When it comes to some that I have liked so far, for example VR Sports Challenge and Dead and Buried, this is the first one to offer a full, single player story mode. Truly an immersive experience from the moment it begins, and being that it is free, you can't go wrong playing Robo Recall.
This game is really a must have! Period.
YES!
Before i was able to launch it with no problem now it stay on a black screen
review_feedback: Waram33, Would you please send me a copy of your OdinSettings.sav and OdinSave*.sav file. We have not been able to reproduce this bug but believe the key may be within the sav. It's in C:\Users\%username%\AppData\Local\RoboRecall\Saved\SaveGames. Email me at tommy.jacob@epicgames.com Thanks!

one_reviews_text: EPIC!!!!

Great game, fantastic physics. The game is absolute fun.  Well done to the devs and to oculus for making this free to Touch owners.  The only downside I am having at the moment is the game crashes a lot. I am sure that will be ironed out with patches.

review_title: Everything I ever hoped for in VR
one_reviews_text: Since I set up my oculus touch, I can't stop playing this game. Even after completing the "Campaign" which consists of 9 scenarios in 3 levels, there is still limitless replayability. The large levels allow many different opportunities and the star challanges keep them fresh and exciting. Not only that, but chucking your empty shotgun at a robot and catching it as it bounces back then blowing their head off never gets old. I can't believe it is free, but is more valuable than any other game in this store.

review_title: Shows How to Use Touch Controls Well!
one_reviews_text:
I came to this game already disliking it 'cuz I'm a hater who dislikes anything popular or hyped up, but this game QUICKLY won me over. As a Unity dev, this game really shows off how good the Unreal engine can look. Gotta love those planar reflections.
-
This game does things fellow VR devs should note. The big one is the teleportation system: push up on the stick, then change direction of the stick. Amazingly simple, very fast to get used to, and allows for action-packed first person shooter games. The number of cool interactions you can do, and the combos you can get for them, is great, from grabbing and throwing bullets, to ripping robots apart, to juggling robots in the air with bullets. At any moment I feel my brain is firing a thousand billion neurons as the battlefield changes and I plan, in less than a second, to teleport behind a robot, grab my shotgun, blow his head off, while grabbing a stray bullet with my other hand and tossing it at a nearby drone. I usually don't care for arcadey games like this, but this is just too good. 
-
The other implementation Epic Games gets right is "distance grabbing" of objects. As a lazy person, I won't stand up to play a game, and I won't turn my chair, and I certainly won't reach to the ground to grab things. NONE of those are necessary here, and between the telekinesis of grabbing close objects you aim at, and the awesome, aimed teleportation, you can be super lazy and enjoy this.
-
The sense of humor is also great, with robots saying things like "you are being an unpleasant customer!" and "blue screen of death!" when you "recall" them. The guy announcer's voice would usually annoy me to death, but in this game for some reason I love it.

Anyway, if you want an idea of how to use Touch controls WELL, this is a great example. Now to find an example of good first person STEALTH since action is covered.

This is one of the best Rift experiences, one of the best Touch experiences, and it's free. Don't miss it.

review_title: VR game that actually feels like a game!
one_reviews_text: I can honestly say that this is one of the first games I've played in VR that feels like something more than a tech demo, proof of concept, "experience," super repetitive wave shooter, or amateur/student project created by one person in a bedroom somewhere. The graphics are great, the design is polished, the mechanics are fun, and it has a nice sprinkling of humor throughout. Add to that the fact that it's done in UnReal and open to modding... Robo Recall deserves every bit of praise it's getting. I can't wait to see where the modding community takes it, and I'm glad to see VR gaming finally beginning to get off the ground after the interesting-but-middling "experiences" we've gotten up to this point. Looking at what was announced and demo'd at GDC, it looks like this is going to be a great year for VR. Do yourself a favor (if, for some weird reason, you haven't) and download Robo Recall. It's free! And it's awesome.

This is the best fps game I've tried in VR yet.  Each weapon has it's own feel and the controls overall are very satisfying. The graphics are great and add to a very convincing atmosphere.  The teleporting controls take a little getting used to but once I got the hang of it there was no prob.

review_title: Imma bash a robo with another robo
one_reviews_text:
Tore an arm off a robot, threw his body at a drone and smacked another robot in the face with the arm.
Their screams still echo in my mind.

This is clearly the future and I happen to happily embrace it.
not working anymore   since update
This is simply one of the best games I've ever played. This is how you do VR well. Extremely fun and easy to pick up and play, even for non-gamers. Amazing.

review_title: Don't Bother Reading Reviews; Just Buy.
one_reviews_text: This game is one of the best games on Oculus Home, and better yet, it's free. My question to you is; why are you even reading this? If you somehow haven't already, press download, NOW! Trust me, it's worth it in a million different ways. The graphics are STUNNING. The gameplay is STUNNING. The replay value is STUNNING. The price is STUNNING. This is the best game hands down. GET IT!
This game is terrific. Countless hours of fun
Immersive, Arcade Style Shooter. This game is so immersive it makes you feel you're in the game. Graphics are top notch, textures are insane. Intense game, definitively reccomend you give this a try!
Please make more games like this!
BEST GAME EVER!

The moment the epic logo pops up and you hear the music blasting through your headphone u know this product is pure bliss.

the movement is great and so is the replayvalue of the game. throwing bullets at robot using them as mobile rocketlauncers and butting there heads together and throwing them in the air while picking up your loaded revolvers and blasting them into 1000s of lill pieces will never get old.
super action, so much fun, i love this game !

review_title: AAA experience but far to short & simple
one_reviews_text:
While the game just looks and feels awesome, really awesome. Expecially throwing is well done in this game. I don't know why, but in this title I can throw stuff very accurate while I can't manage it well in others.

But the replay value is low to me. I don't mind playing the missions again and again, the shooting is fun, but the non-skipable sequenzes of Odin talking to you are really annoying. I don't want to see them over and over.

The levels are more like small arenas. I wish the would be bigger and more diverse levels. You basically just encounter wave after wave in a small area. While the actual level is in fact small, the places feel big because of VR. But there is not much you can discover.

Also the game lacks free locomotion, a mod fixed this pretty quickly but you can't play it with the leaderboards when mods are active. :(

I really hope there are more levels to come and an update that allows me to skip these sequences. I also would like to be able to skip the countdowns as well.

Bottom line for me is that this is just yet another wave shooter, but a very well done and good looking one. :)

review_title: you need to remove the fix view point.
one_reviews_text:
this is a must have for vr... it is the best game out right now and will be for awhile. that being said i rated it four stars. I have a 980 ti, and i do notice frame drops or the hands will seem that lag. not sure whats going on there alos tracking... if im facing left and i tellaport one way so im standing in front of the guy he will be to my right. what do i mean by this? i mean the game has a place for you to stand and look straight ahead. and no matter what that is your front view so you have to lift up the visor or look straight up to see where your standing in the room in order to make sure when you telaport your looking in the direction you want... that needs to be fixed in a game that has you jumping all around ducking shooting spinning around for kills that needs to be fix. instead of having a fix point of view when i telaport where ever im looking should be my front view...

yes i understand why they did it like this. oculus tracking isnt the best they want to make sure your always standing right in front of the sensors. i understand that... but thats now how it should be. i rather buy a third camera then be limited by the game  because of oculus poor room scale tracking. hopefully a fix comes soon.
One of the best games out there for the touch controllers..

review_title: Best game I've played so far
one_reviews_text: Graphics are incredible, game play is incredible. Thus far other games just don't compare. If this is the start, can't wait to see what the future holds

This is easily one of the most enjoyable experiences on the oculus store-front. The re-playability is nearly infinite and the gameplay is extremely engaging. The only downside I have found so far in this experience is the limits of the teleportation when the sensors are set up in such a way as to be 360 degree or room-scale compatible. In some way, the teleportation is not intuitive if you are playing in 360 degrees of freedom.
Best game to come out so far, visuals are amazing, game play is great. Fixed the teleport issue so I have updated to 5 Stars!

Excellent shooter! Some of the achievements are really hard, so I keep coming back! I love the teleport control and being able to pull robots apart and beat other robots with their body parts! 5 stars for sure!

I've been waiting for a release like this since I purchased my Oculus. I haven't played with the system  in a couple months as I was bored with "experience only" titles. This was a free download for my new touch controllers and I wasn't holding my breath. WOW! Worth the price of entry my friends!
But I feel like I'm getting exercise and that has to stop!

Ok, dont't get me wrong this is a very good free game and that's why there is 5 stars for my vote on it but if there is a series of this I would very much like to be able to walk around on my freewill like you can choose to in Arizona Sunshine instead of having to use a teleport system that doesn't like me turning my back to the sensors.
Also, I would have loved to see some multiplayer features mostly like co-op just because well I'm a sucker for it, survival type multiplayer would be interesting and of course just plainy shooting at other people in a deathmatch type or whatever else that can go with it. (Defend a checkpoint in a team deathmatch)
If this is ever done please put on public multiplayer servers as well as building up a friends list as a requirement is simply frustrating.  
I'm sure that all of the demands above are to much to ask for a free game but I would pay a good price for a second of this game with all or at least some of the perks mentionned above. 
Other then that, it a funny story with good gameplay, I've played 2 FPS shooters on VR so far, one of them is Robo Recall and dam it feels real to shoot at stuff on VR with both games wich is very satisfying.
At first if you've never hold a gun in your hand to shoot stuff like me it feels very hard but it actually doesn't take a lot of time to get use to it and be quite good at getting how it works. 
It is feeling more irrelevent in this game to waste ammo but in a game like Arizona Sunshine its important to save on the bullets on harder difficulty settings which means aiming right and in the head for the most times at least.
Anyways , on that note I don't know how anyone can complain after receiving this game for free and certainly more so when it is currently hard to find a game that you can have a lot of fun on VR while your going trought a really funny story. 
Without it being free and depending on the price I would have given it a 3 stars if I would have even bought it in the first place.

Mission 1-1 and 2-1 work, however mission 1-2 "short circut" crashes while loading.  Forum states there is a mod which allows you to select missions directly, however I'm hesitate to run any third party software.  I'm stuck at 12% completed.
This game is so much fun, the graphics and visuals are amazing. Love the feel and style of it. The only thing I do not like is not being able to turn 360 otherwise it is worth the buy!

review_title: EPIC GAME! but download Robomotion mod
one_reviews_text: This game is awesome. I have been looking forward to this for some time now after I got my touch controlles. The weapons are great, the bots are cool, and the level design is top notch. But the only flaw is that is the teleporting. I installed the Robomotion mod that lets me run around and jump with teleporting as an option for hard to reach locations. This mod should be a default mode of movement in the game.

review_title: Genuinely one of the best VR games
one_reviews_text: Most games I played in VR with my touch controllers can be categorized as 'cool'. This can only be described as 'Amazing'. The touch support is flawless, the controls and mechanics are intuitive and the game is a lot of fun. Definetly try it out!
Great game. I strongly recommend it.

I never write reviews on games but I just had to for this one. I have been looking forward to playing this game ever since I played the Bullet Train demo and I can tell you, it did NOT dissapoint. Epic Games has done an amazing job at making the player feel like a bad*** and make it feel good while doing so. The controls are perfect for the VR environment, and I felt no sickness at all when playing. The story mode is tons of fun and has a ton of replayability for you to go back to levels you played before and complete objectives, go for the highscore on the leaderboard, or unlock more customization for your guns. The story mode in this game is incredibly fun and is a breath of fresh air for those that want to play offline as most games only feature multiplayer or have a lackluster story mode that feels like an afterthought. I cant recommend this game enough whether it be for free or full price. Other developers should look to Robo Recall as a shining example of how to make a great VR title. I look forward to seeing what Epic does in the future.

I am more into adventure style games, but sometimes a game is so polished and well done that it doesn't matter what genre it's in. Graphically, it's top notch, and the touch controls are perfect with my 3 sensor setup. This game will make you scream like Rambo. And it's free. Just an amazing VR experience. I can't see anyone with an Oculus not playing this game.

This provided me with possible the best gaming experience I have ever had- ever. Being able to catch robots in your hand and rip off their limbs is truly awesome. And, it is FREE. Definitely pick this game up, it will be very difficult to top this experience for me. Hats off to the developers, cheers!

Showdown Demo, Bullet Train, ...Robo Recall! For the whiners: there's already a locomotion mod out there. ;) A truly fresh AAA VR Action Experience from Epic! You can even mod the sh#t out of it as u like. Awesome! Its on the same high polished level as Elite Dangerous. A must have!

This game is fantastic.
This is how it should be done. I'm usually sceptic about teleportation, i prefer free movement, but it fits well in this game. 1 minor complain about the teleportation is that it's difficult to orientate when you're using a 360° setup, it's best played always frontfacing.
The game is also kinda short. There are only 3 locations split up in 3 different missions.
There is good replayvalue with the achievements and stars you collect, but just 1 more location would be really great.

review_title: One of the better VR experiences
one_reviews_text:
Very nice touch implementation, they feel very natural e precise, the whole experience is a lot of fun to play. You can play one mission multiple and multiple times just for the fun of it and never get tired of it. 
It was terrific having this game for free with touch controllers, but it would certainly worth its cost anyway.

LOVE THIS GAME! IT IS INTENSE AND VERRY FUN ONCE YOU GET USE TO THE CONTROLS, RELOADS AND GRABBING YOUR GUNS IN A TIMELY MANNER. ALSO USEING  YOUR  HEAD MOVEMENT TO DUCK THE BULLETS IS A BLAST AND HELPS YOU WITH SURVIVAL. WOULDN'T RECOMMEND PLAYING FOR LONG PERIODS OF TIME BUT FOR A QUICK THRILL RIDE HERE AND THERE THIS IS AMAZINGLY THE BEST VR GAME TO DATE.....

review_title: Very well done - what a blast!
one_reviews_text: Although the teleportation is better than most, but not perfect, it does not truly detract from the game. The immersion and gameplay are simply enjoyable. It's not an easy game by any means, but it's so much fun, and awesome looking, I don't mind the learning curve. The graphics are actually decent, as is the interactivity and sounds. I can't believe it's free. This would easily be one of the $30-$50 games that I would buy. I hope the other companies start upping their game!

Possibly the best VR game so far!  I don't mind the teleportation -- I had no motion sickness despite an incredibly action-packed experience.  It's a juggling act to determine when best to grab weapons, shoot or just grab the robots and tear them apart, and when to teleport.  Nice details:  Short, timed challenges, can take a lot of damage before dying, AI voice giving guidance.   Really unbelievable and highly recommended.  Classy move to make this available for free.

review_title: My Best VR Experience so far !!!!!
one_reviews_text: I felt like a real super hero, the graphics, sound, design, .... all together fits very well into an arcadish gunblazing fun videogame. i wish all other developers take notes specially with the graphics settings. i can finaly utilize my gtx 1080. i very much recomend it to everyone who likes being in action and swet alittle :)

review_title: This game is a reason to buy into VR
one_reviews_text: Forget the people complaining about the teleportation, its easy to adjust to. All you need to do is point the joystick in the direction you want to end up facing after you teleport. The graphics, commentary, and game play are fantastic. This is one game that would have been worth paying for and its in the store for free! Do yourself a favor, if you are into shooters and love vr pick this one up.

LOVE this game!! It gets me off my fat lazy butt and relieves stress by shooting and tossing around robots. The graphics are incredible and the dialog is fun, very portalesk. Highly recommended. Not a fan of teleport movement usually but as you can orient your facing during the move it actually adds to the feel. Its a great advantage to TP behind a shield robot and shoot him in the head, alot!

review_title: THIS is what the store needs!
one_reviews_text: I just tried Robo Recall... and HOLY C**P! ... THIS! Gadfriggindammit! The store needs more apps like THIS! ... ok... calming down. Adrenaline levels cooling off. The graphics. The soundtrack. The feel of the guns... I kindof understand why this took a bit longer to arrive than expected. Because, only played for a couple of hours, like I said, this game was worth the wait so far. Bending around, flinging objects, blasting satisfying weapons at finely modeled robots. The teleport felt a bit weird. But I soon got the hang of making sure to turn the pointer at the right direction and started to use it to my advantage. Maybe a free-roaming mod could be better, don't know. Just look at how well Windlands plays in free-roam mode. But then again. This feels awesome as it is. And all of it with pumping music. And I only banged the touch into the wall once. So that's something. ;)

review_title: Great Game That Could Be Much Better
one_reviews_text: This game is deffo good fun and well produced. But I am afraid I will not be playing for long periods of time due to the teleportation feature, it gives you no real control when it comes to movement, why use teleport in the first place, its not like there are not enough free buttons on the controllers, the teleport doe not give me the control I require to move accurately with speed, furthermore why is there no reload, dropping the guns would not be so bad if i could get my guns out fast enough, when these 2 very simple problems are resolved I will revisit this game and undoubtably give it a 5 star rating, until then its a waste of disk space.
The only thing I didnt like about this game is how you move and the way your facing is always the front of the room istead of the way you were already facing but still just amazing game.

review_title: Counter Strike was a Half Life Mod
one_reviews_text: This game is the best experience on the Rift, amazing, great, blah blah... The real gem here is the level of access Epic has given the modding community! i cannot wait to see what the incredibly talented modders come up with.

The visuals are polished, everything looks great. Makes you feel like you are in a real futuristic city. As others have mentioned though, the teleport reorientation can be a problem at times. If you aren't facing forward while teleporiting, you wont be facing in the direction of the arrow once you get there. Some other minor things a little glitchy, but I'm sure those will get ironed out. Great game and a lot of fun, and it's FREE!

They nailed it! Absolutely nailed it!!!! This company has it down, setting the bar this high in virtual reality video games; is going to make other designers push harder!! Its going to be really difficult to trump this one for a while! Recommend settings your graphics interface inside of the games video settings, as high as your pixel compensation load can handle; between your CPU Speed, Ram & Hard-Drive usage..

Awesome game, gunplay is satisfying, aiming is a little funny but that's just the Touch controllers, its gorgeous, and surprisingly funny. Glad to see what a true triple A developer can do with VR and really looking forward to the future now. I do hope they at least add an option to toggle the teleport orientation for people with 360 setups. Full locomotion would be great, but simply not forcing your orientation after teleporting will suffice.

review_title: Great 90s-style arcade fun brough to VR
one_reviews_text: I wasn't looking forward to this game because Bullet Train didn't really do it for me. But it's soooo good! The gameplay is near perfect (except for the forward facing teleportation that they're fixing soon) and it's an absolute blast to play - great visuals, entertaining style and absolute mayem. My Touch controllers are getting a bashing against my walls though - worse than Super Hot! The only thing I'd like to see is the ability to adjust the angle of the gun with respect to the Touch controller, like in Space Pirate Trainer.

"Riiiiidge Racer"" - I mean, "Robo Recall!".


Robo Recall is unapologetically a first person arcade shooter that channels the spirits of the likes of Namco, AM2 and Sega.


It has all the tropes of those old arcade games and embrasses them fully, but this time doesn't charge you a quid a go (ok, you need all the expensive VR gear, but I'm guessing you already have all that given you're reading this!).


I don't care that it's a wave shooter, and I don't care that it's teleport only - this is an absolute joy to play. It transports me back to those over the top 90's arcade games, complete with a modern VR twist, and I couldn't be happier []-)


Fast and frantic arcade fun - what more do you want?!

Easily the best VR game to date. This is the main game that I've been waiting for since I got my oculus and it doesn't disappoint. It's free and better than any content that I've paid for. My only issue is that they didn't give a 360 option which makes no sense. This is a game where things are constantly happening all around you. I can't play it right now without using the 360 mod. There's just no way I can stay facing forward. This game should have been 360 only.

A great looking -- and more importantly, great feeling -- game that evokes the best arcade style gameplay of yesteryear. Combat is fast and intense, and weapons, object interaction, menus, everything feels very snappy. In particular I love the "telekineses" item pickup -- it feels really good, and pulling apart robots feels great too, with excellent audio, haptic cues, physics, and visual effects.

The locomotion is a push-stick-and-release teleport with arrow pointing to determine your forward direction after the teleport, similar to games like Arizona Sunshine and Call of the Starseed. I really really wish I could rotate in place with a simple left/right on the stick, but they don't support that sadly. I have a front facing setup, and it works ok, but a 360 setup would probably work a lot better as you often get surrounded by enemies.

For me replayability is high as there are challenges on every mission, and I already want to go replay the few missions I did. Of course, I've only played an hour or so so this could change easily. However, the fact the game is open to modding makes me hopeful it has a long tail.

Overall, excellent game that reminds me of strongly of a Sega style shooter, especially with the font and UI design (orange and blue text on white background screams Virtua Fighter to me), and the over-the-top announcer is straight out of Daytona. A+, would pull apart robots again!

this is truly a work of art. it takes me back to the arcade where it was pick up a gun and shoot things but the arsenal you can bring with you is just amazing if i get bored with constantly shooting things in the face i can just switch to teleporting around and punching and ripping bots apart or using them as shields and even guns on occasion. you will not go wrong in purchasing the touch and just playing this.
like i said if you think that video gaming can be art? then you should see this masterpiece.

Honestly, I was getting tired of dxxn stupid disgusting slide move locomotion of VR games. I really hate it. because I am not prone to motion sickness. but with 
locomotion of robo recall, I could play it more than 1 hour without any problems !!! love it, brilliant locomotion. best ever!!
Love It, Keep it up

An outstanding shooter! I love the many creative ways to destroy robots with both melee and ranged tactics. I'd like to see more weapons in the arsenal back at the office and perhaps a database that tells about all the different robots and their strengths and weaknesses. Again, outstanding!!!

This is one of the better games I have played with the touch.  Fun levels, good sense of progression with weapons, and it has a good humor as well.  The one complaint I have is the movement.  If you are using a 360 setup, which most people probably are at this point, it is near impossible not to get turned around every time you move.  If this was altered/fixed, I would rate 5 stars.

FINALLY!!!!!!!

But seriously, please scratch this teleportation idea, I wanna freaking move around these worlds, let me do so with speed with a thumbstick. Doom 3 on VR gave me zero naseau even while sprinting around corners.

review_title: Free Game Better Than Paid Games
one_reviews_text: This game is amazing. It takes full advantage of the level of stimulation that the Rift and Touch can provide. The graphics are great, the weapons feel balanced, and the reload system is amazing. I was having so much fun I didn't realise that I had rotated 90 degrees in my play area until I took the headset off. Since this game is currently free, there is no reason not to play it.

review_title: Bullet Dodging Like in the Matrix
one_reviews_text: The best free game, the best FPS game period for Oculus. Requires some good focus and hindsight coordination being able to predict next move. Helps to broaden peripheral field viewing and simulated like the Matrix. The developers are one the right track but free roaming for regular movement and phase dashing as a feature instead.

This game just blows my mind. I have no problem whatsoever with the teleportation mechanics, which actually work great. The game is action packed, gorgeus and even the music is awesome. It truly feels like a AAA experience, and im sure even if there are not a lot of levels i will spend alot of time in this game. After every mission i already play it a second time to improve my score and make the game last longer, meaning i've played for 1.5 hours and not even gone beyond the third mission. I cant believe this game was free, altough with the price of the touch controllers, i see it as being a part of that package. Thank you oculus and epic games!

I've been waiting for Robo Recall for a while. Now that it's finally here, I can say that it's lived up to the hype. It doesn't have the most depth, but MAN is it fun. Controls are super tight and the visuals look great.

Like others have said, the only problem is that the game forces me to face "forward", even though I'm using the "experimental" 360 degree "room-scale" sensor setup.

First of all, I have to give this game both thumps up! While I was playing, I got so intense I smacked my touch controllers hard on the wall couple times. For the impact I felt on my hand, I expected the worst. but No broken parts, No cracks, just a little scatches and still works fine!!  Way to go Oculus!

I'm a visual person and the visuals in this game are top notch!  From the woven gloves of your player where the threads are visible to the rust and imperfections of the robot's steel; everything is very detailed.   The shotgun's wood glares and there's a shine in all the metal in the game. Don't know why other games can't have these visuals. Must be hard to make. lol.

Robo Recall is super fun arcade style action.
Teleport system works great in my opinion. You can not only point and teleport but also choose a direction in which you want to look after teleportation, this is a great addition! This is the first game for me, that pushes my own movement, even more than Super Hot. Which really helps the immersion into the game.

Whether it's the music, the graphics or the arcadey gameplay, something in this makes me feel like I"m a kid playing an arcade game again, joyus and intense.

As for the gameplay, it is fast paced, actually challenging, and sucessfuly encourages and rewards creativity.
this game looks cool and fun

This game has a wide variety of missions that will last you hours, customizable weoponry, outstanding graphics, an extremly comedic AI, and it even lets you have 6 different game slots which means you can have a slot for how far you are in the game and the rest for people of your choice.

Honestly...the best VR-game i played so far. Apart from Elite Dangerous. :)
 It's all kinds of fun. Folks out there....get it! 
My relationship with oculus is going from ...never mind...to come on! Give it a chance!..:)D

Thank you Oculus!!! Free for all Touch Users is ...(look at the Headline!!)

This game is excellent, first game on the rift that I feel the need to write about. superb graphics, super fun, funny, way better than Superhot!.
Just wish they would allow you to move with the joysticks on the touch controller, and fix that whole teleport direction thing.
If you're facing a direction then teleport using that direction to take into consideration 360 degree setups.
Everything else is awesome and it's free!!!!!

As many people already said, this is by far the most polished game that feels from its quality like a high class AAA for general pc games. However, I hate teleporation locomotion. Please advise the developer to implement free locomotion with stick direction. In terms of gameplay I have to add that front facing is not enough, this needs definitely 360° for lots of robots were behind me and I got constantly shot and lost HP with being aware of it. I think 360° tracking setups should be a general VR standard vor VR high end system. It is mostly annoying to lose tracking when it is absolutely necessary to change direction or look behind you with the virtual hands.

First i would like to say for free this is brilliant. But now i will be critical. The game is very polished I love the presentation & humour. Its alot of fun as an arcade game it works really well & they have done a great job. Locomotion is dissapointing as yet again we have to teleport around, so looses a point. The only other issue for me is i'm sick of these type of games already, it is very shallow & i don't feel the emotional connection i would feel in something a bit deeper. I will not deduct points for that but i really hope to see more complex games being developed in future.
Amazing graphics, gameplay and action. with mod support. 10/10

review_title: One of the best games for me so far.
one_reviews_text: Would like to see more levels perhaps. Or I'll give some mods a go. But overall..it is well worth it.

I have played Arizona Sunshine and PSVR Farpoint. This game is better than those.

This wave shooter is so freaking awesome. The progression feels real and getting all the stars is challenging, however, the upgrades to your weapons are awesome. The game is just great to kill stuff in. So much more satisfying ripping a robot apart and slamming it into the ground compared to headshotting a zombie or anything like that.

Good gun play, mobility, good graphics, this is a true quality VR game and one of the most fun games I've played in a long while. Does seem to have a few performance problems but nothing that ruins the game. 
Also has a pop up on the hud when you're facing backwars which would probably be anoying with a 360 setup but is useful for us 2 sensor peasents.

Im a geek and martial artist and you guys just put quite abit of the 2 together. Most ppl go in guns blazing, I on the other hand like getting behind the enemy and taking them by surprize! It would be nice if you could grab ligiments before grabbing the robots chest or back!

review_title: Well Worth Waiting! Also No Prob w/ 360
one_reviews_text:
I have been waiting for this release ever since  I purchased touch, and played Bullet Train.  All I can say is it has exceeded my expectations! 
***I have 3 sensor set up and had no messages, or errors turng around 360 degrees.  Maybe issues with 2 sensors but mine runs flawless!!
Also Free..... AMAZING!!!

review_title: Best VR game i have played
one_reviews_text:
great graphics, sound design and gameplay with great replay value and tripple a production and polish making for great replay value plus with oculus supporting t its free so you have no reason to not give it a try. the only complaint is they dont support people that have 360 setups so it can get quite disorienting. but besides that brillent game.

update: mod support fixed 360 issue

This game by far is the best game ive played on any platform ,the ,gameplay sucks you in from the start .The feel,everything about this game is polished.
Game changer for everyone involed in this title,I would tell oculus to showcase this game anywhere they can and watch everyone get excited about the future of gaming on the rift,well done guys.

The new king of VR games. Best single-player AAA game so far. The graphics are stunning, the controls are perfect, the story is funny and the game is just plain fun. Good job Epic/Oculus

Edited: There are some fake low-star reviews around claiming that you can't turn 360°. That is complete nonsense.

A polished game that looks and performs like a dream (GTX1080). A very good shooter with only a 2 issues. First it is way to short, second the 3D audio is slightly off for me (I can normally hear things behind me better but they seem quiet). Other than that, mind blown and really looking forward to all the mods.

Why take the time to read my review when it's free???  Just try it!

If you're still reading, the gameplay is similar to Bullet Train and Super-Hot VR but oh so much better/deeper (and COLOR IS GENERALLY A GOOD THING TO PUT IN A GAME, lol), and the pistol/holster system works exactly the same as Dead and Buried. What's also really cool is when a robot is about to overcome you and now you're able to reach behind your shoulder and whip out a shotgun and blast it in the face. It's an exhilarating combination of shooter and melee with waves getting increasingly intense, and good variety of baddies. The new twist is being able to tear apart your enemies and cudgel others with their body parts. You can also grab bullets and throw them back. How you can throw a bullet back at the velocity necessary to pierce metal is beyond me but hey it's a game.

I don't understand why it's free, the top-shelf production could easily earn this title premium pricing and it's not like Epic needs help getting on the map; they're legends already!  Maybe it's simply to increase sales of Touch, who knows. Regardless, Thank you sincerely to whoever was responsible for that decision!

The is no limitation to a foreward facing gameplay. The only limit is the cable... and the real walls ... and my desk...and my kids. Oculus should bring out some soft bumpers for the touch controllers especially for this game ;)

Concerning the teleporting. Ok, I am also a friend of giving people the choise. But I don't get the point, why so many people have problems with the teleporting system. In my oppinion it is the best teleporting system so far... I really think you people simply didn't get the concept of choosing your point of view before teleporting.

This is a simple fun game with great graphics and fluid gameplay. It feels just right. Though it is not too simple, as you have to use the teleport function wisely. I can understand that people wish another moving option, but I think the teleport offers interesting tactical options. It is a bit confusing at first, but you get used to it quite soon. So I decided to I like the movement.
I already loved Bullet Train and was really looking forward to this title. I was not at all disappointed. 
It also will be interesting to see the mods.

Although I miss free roaming (please add it as an option!), I must admit that I never teleported any better in a VR shooter game.
I love the graphics and the gameplay which  are very polished. 

Tomorrow I will feel muscle ache from crouching during the boss fights! I know it. But it was worth the pain. xD 
Seriously! Great work! Robo Recall turned out to be the game I expected!

THIS IS THE TITLE THAT MAKES THE FUTURE NOW.  the game play is insanely fun and the feel, visuals and sounds are perfect. Only complaint is that I need a new graphics card to run Pixel Density at 2.0... wow, 2.0 Looks so good but I get too much judder. Suprisingly Runs well on my 6gb gtx 780, 16gb RAM, and i7 4790K!! (high settings, 4x AA, pixel density = 0.7) works great for me!
immersive! it makes you move! it looks great! i love it
A game with so much fun, I was looking for a good VR experience, I finally found it !

where do i start? from the time i bought my Rift and the touch controllers i had a limited amount of games (due to getting used to  the rift) so i was waiting for a game i really wanted to pick up which involved shooting. 

When Oculus announced this game and even though i have the touch i still recieved this game for free! +1 and not only that this game is amazing! the shooting is on point, robots come at you from every corner and the best thing of the game it's just down right fun! especially in the office, Throwing around paper balls at things. Oculus i love this game keep it up! :D Props to the development team and everyone involved in making this fantastic title.

Not sure why people are saying full 360 doesn't work I'm playing it with update(few issues) teleport faces toward front cameras {there is a mod fix but only works mod mode not in game... i turn all the way around no error messages... make sure all sensors are being seen in system before playing.  Only issue I am having is teleporting sometimes points me in the wrong direction but its prbly my own fault need more practice.  
Would like 2 things tho... 
1) option to toggle grip/drop 
2) option to use stick movement (mod works in mod levels but not in game progression devs please add option

Awesome game love that it is free... and like the fact they have the mod editor will be checking that out too.

review_title: Best VR Game I've experienced thus far
one_reviews_text: Kudos to the Oculus team for being able to come up with such a fun arcadey game yet with a humourous story to entertain the player. This is without a doubt the best touch game currently available and I'm sure this will greatly affect the sales once news gets out. Times like this where I feel glad i've bought the Oculus and patiently waited for the Touch to launch. Thank you Oculus Team for providing us with such an amazing game for free; I have good faith that we will get more successful games just like this and Chronos in the future.

I've been waiting for this since it was first announced. Graphics are great, gameplay is great, and the humor is good. FREE with Touch! Honestly, it's obvious why it has a solid 5 star rating. The overall quality is top notch, and the game is genuinely fun to play. It's a great Touch game that showcases the gameplay power of VR!

Really great game theres no reason not to get this title. Humor guns explosions dodging action its all here however worst teleport system i have ever seen its just sad even. add in motion controll instead and maybe 2 more weapons i would spend 30 dollars easy on this if u just added that

The first game on the Oculus I have tried and thought "This is it!, what many have dreamed would happen but never in my lifetime". The quick arcade style fite the Oculus setup perfectly. You simply have to play this game.

Takes a lot of the best combot elements that Super Hot  has and brings them to the next level, making you feel like the ultimate robo-killing bad a**.  I love the 90s arcade feel it has - it's a game that doesn't take itself too seriously, but is not overly cheesy or try-hard.  Worth the money!

For those complaining about not having free movement - do some basic research.  There are MODS (supported in game) available folks that do this!!! Links are listed in the Oculus Forums and alluded to in the game. DUH!!! Go get the MOD and quick complaining. Awesome FREE (for touch) game.

The gameplay is solid, it has converted me to a full believer to the Oculus touch controllers all the way.  So much so that I just bought an Oculus combo pack and couldn't be happier.  

Now all we need are more GUNS!

Love this game! The gunplay works beautifully and the graphics are great as well. I get What people are saying about the teleporting and forward facing, but I'm sure this is something that will be fixed in the future. Plus it's free with touch, and who doesn't love free stuff?

review_title: Free Locomotion should be an option !!
one_reviews_text: If it was it would be 5 star for me, and there is the question of when to implement time slow while moving around free, since it is activated while deciding where to teleport. I think it could be activated for a limited time, chargeable and upgradeable maybe for free locomotion ! Thougths?
I just buy the touch yesterday only for test a game on steam, and it was disappointing. But this... Robo Recall is already a classic for me ! A new good vr experience, on par with Elite Dangerous.

review_title: So proud of EPIC! What a showcase piece!
one_reviews_text: This is the one we have all been waiting for!  It's amazing!  It's one of those, yeah this is what "VR was made for type of experiences" that just makes you say "Wow!"  Thank you for this amazing and hard to believe "FREE" experience! Thanks Epic for all your amazing work through the years!

Arcade style shoot-em-up that makes you feel like you're living out a 90's arcade game. Stunning visuals, responsive controls that feel natural, wonderful audio and soundtrack. The best VR experience I've had so far.

Everything is top notch, also when holding things like the book and coffee mug that weight was simulated, and it feels believable, very smart idea. Graphics, Sound, UI, all A+ only issue is with the direction of teleportation not being intuitive (BUT THAT IS VERY MINOR)

iam a htc vive owner using revive software to play this game , its a amazing game the things that u do in the game like grabbing bullets and throwing back at them is amazing and mele combat is good as u can pull them apart , i give this an ace game well reconmened

This is a superb game & almost as good as Super Hot!!! This game makes full use of the Touch controllers and is great to look at too.
The only thing missing is the option of totally free movement, but I understand that someone is in the process of achieving that with a 'mod'.

Amazing game with stunning graphics! It's one of those few titles that really feels like your in the game... as @PlayLanco stated, this game would be an amazing online/Coop game! It'd be awesome to join a friend.

Robo Recall may be the best VR-experience so far. Gameplay, graphics, humor...all at its best. It´s a little too short, but with a very high replayability.

But please EPIC, add free movement as an option! The continuous reorientation in a 360-setup is just a major fun-brake.

Now this is a AAA VR Game! Everything about this game is awsome, I'm floored by the amout of detail this game has its just so beautiful! Plus the Mod support this game has will ensure this game is relevant for years to come! Bravo Oculus + Epic!!!

I've tried quite a few games, this one tops them all.  Totally immersive, and humorous to boot.  It's an adrenaline rush as robots come at you from all directions.  You can shoot at them but also grab them and rip them apart with your hands.
I'm really enjoying this!

review_title: Everything I've ever wanted out of VR!
one_reviews_text: This game is exactly what I've been looking for in a VR shooter.   There's inuitive teleportation and responsive shooting.  Ripping apart robots with your barehands is a definite plus.  Would definitely recommend and it's free!  What have you got to lose!
You want an experiance to show your skills in hand to hand combat? how about Snipping with pistols? Having your mind think you are in this Epic Battle. Then this game is for you. Truely Amazing.

Game is great and fun! But sometimes I just want to blast robots and don't want to have keep moving to the next mission. It'd be great if there was just an open-ended mode that allowed moving around the city finding and destroying robots.

review_title: Best looking game in VR to date
one_reviews_text: Looks amazing runs smoothe even bumped up to 1.2 no issues very smooth I may try higher settings I am using 3 980's but not sure if SLI even counts with the Rift software really. Fun to play great response from aiming and guns in general.

1. I cant find any tech support.
2. done a google search.

The game was running fine right up until i delete 2 saved games. Now, i can start up the menu systems no problem. select a game slot and start. its at this point the left eye goes blank. The Oculus software requires rebooting to get it back again.
AAA title for VR! Thank you for 360 teleportation update! Now is much better!!
Amazing!

I lol at the reactions of the robots. Their humor made me come back for more. The game is just so beautifully made. Having such a blast and only finished the first two levels. With the addition of mods this game is going to make strides in the VR community.

This is the most polished VR game available. Epic has knocked it out of the park. The controls feel very responsive and pair well with the creative gameplay mechanics in the game. I never thought throwing my guns at enemies would be just as fun as shooting them.

Robo Recall is amazingly fun, fast paced and looks absolutely gorgeous. The game sprinkles humor throughout, has a great soundtrack and encourages you to come back over and over with leaderboards, mission challenges and MOD support.
and this masterpiece is free??  Nice!
Absolutely amazing for Oculus Touch. No motion sickness and lots of fun!

Never put up a review of anything so far on VR but this is another level. Not into FPS but the immersion is unbelievable. Got the three sensor setup, not a problem. Also got the locomotion mod, superb, can move 360 and also teleport, sweeeeet!!!!
immersive and humorous, teleportation system is one of the best i've encountered. If you own touch controllers, then this title needs to get comfy on your drive.

One of the Best shooter games I have played in VR. It is very polished.Great Sound track, Amazing graphics. Everything was just put together really well! Very skeptical of games in VR but this game really shows the true potential of game development in VR.
game seems great and look like it could be loads of fun, however im just not a fan of only being able to move by teleporting, it just gets kinda annoying imho, besides that games great
OMG!!!

Logged on to see that this was available.
I think I just pee'd myself.
Just got my touch controllers this weekend.  Absolutly love this game.  This is one amazing first person shooter!!  Thank you Oculus Studio

This game feels wonderful, everything seems to click in to place. Grappling with enemies and finding ways to not use the guns has been the best part. The guns are great too... I've been playing levels over and over to improve and I never feel like it is the same.
Probably the best shooter game in VR, Looks great! Top 5 VR Games I've Played!
i like this

It's simply the best out right now.  While it's not incredibly long it's longer then most of these expensive tech demos in the store right now.  And it's free.  I hope this pushes other devs to pull their heads out of their cheeks.

Everything from the gun handling to the graphics to the sound design is spot on. Easily the best VR game out there at the moment.

Only thing that needs improvement is the way the teleportation orientation works when you're someone that has more than 2 sensors.
Very intense, fun and a really good introduction to VR+Touch.

It is a fine crafted game, and i do not regret the purchase but it is far away from a full gaming experience. It is more a really good looking wave shooter we have seen so much. And it also needs some finetuning and locomotion / teleport options.

The best VR game so far.  This is worth buying an Oculus Rift for and the game is free!  Excellent graphics, music and sound effects.  It feels like you are inside an epic light gun arcade machine game.  Absolute quality and ridiculously immersive 10/10

It's amazing! This is the best vr game.
I purchased Oculus for this game.

Game is really fun and very immersive.  It has a lot of variety in how you can destroy bots.  The teleporting takes some getting used to and I wish I could just run around using the joystick but once you get used to it the movement is ok.
UE4 at its best! Perhaps the first AAA quality game in VR for me. Thought about only giving four stars because of the missing free locomotion, but teleporting is the current standard.

This game is great! It is the model of how a game should/could be. More games like this. Nearly perfect; I can't say enough great things about this game. Crashes a little- but just work out that bug and it is non-stop fun.

Okay I realy do not understand why there is no smooth locomotion system. Oculus touch has perfect thumbsticks for this. In my case adding system like this to unreal engine vr template took me ~15 minutes. It is very easy and you can get much more players.
It's a must purchase!
I've had so much fun with this, AND I've lost 13 pounds.

It's not perfect. If it cost me money, i'd give it only 4 stars for being too short and kinda repetitive.
But as far as free games goes, it doesn't get ANY better than this. I'd buy it for 30€.
perfect experience!

This thing is a blast (pun intended) so far...Only played for a 1/2 hour or so, and still getting used to the teleporting for moving around, but it's a ton-o-fun VR FPS, and the robots comedic comments while blowing their heads off adds to the laughs...
Seriously, this is in my top list of most fun I've ever had playing a game in general. Thank you so much Epic and Oculus for putting this together and making it happen. So amazing!
just great
Thanks to the 360 Patch now the greatest experience to date!
One of the very few VR game I come back to to just enjoy. Great use of the VR including the touch.
so. fun.

Love this game. Easy to pick up and makes you feel like  a hero. The teleportation aspect could be improved but there are already mods being released that feature locomotion. Definately 5 out of 5 stars.

review_title: Best VR Game outside driving sims
one_reviews_text: Impressive in every way. Maybe I wasn't expecting so much, but it has humor, depth , polish and doesnt take itself too seriously (though it could if it wanted to).

First off thank you for the free access, and job well done! This is a lot of fun! 
I only wish it was free walking and multiplayer!

review_title: The best RV game so far! second to none!
one_reviews_text: if anyone give it anything less the five stars need to go out and get a real pc. because im loving every thing it has, wish i could have shared this experience with my ancestors ff
Just phenomenal. I have no said, "holy s**t!!!!, awesome!!!!" so many times in a row while playing a VR game yet. Makes you feel like a superhuman god ninja from the future. Couldn't be better.

Totally freaked me out at first because it is so completely immersive. When the robots ran towards  me, I was reacting as if they were real. I'd imagine once you get used to it, the effect won't be as powerful as your first few times playing.

review_title: Best Graphics of any VR game out!
one_reviews_text: This game has amazing Graphics.  Everything is so crisp and looks amazing.  Gameplay is even better....the mechanics are so smooth and amazing.  Weapons are extremely fun, missions are great, etc.  Great job Oculus and Epic Games!!!

review_title: Shooty Shooty gun hands is a masterpiece
one_reviews_text: Listening to shooty shooty gun hands is worth 5 stars alone.
I cleared out a spare room just to roomscale this game without hurting myself.

Everything with this game is just awesome! 
This is now my nr 1 game to showcase the Oculus
The funnest expierience i have had in vr .

very good game, nice graphics, great interaction and movement mechanics, some games get me dizzy but this one does not. very fun, and looks like alot to do other than most VR games than can be totally conquered within a day 
and its FREE
They nailed it with the arcade style, really lends itself well to pushing to the next level.

review_title: A solid base for the future
one_reviews_text: Epic Managed to showcase a solid base for the future of vr. Everything in this game is very polished and fun. The graphics are incredible and you even get mod support right from the start. Cant wait to see what the community makes!

review_title: My Favorite VR Experience Hands Down
one_reviews_text: I just really have fun playing this.  It's a very arcade style shootem that is great fun in short bursts.   I always find myself drawn back in to see what new robot or challenges the next level holds.

review_title: Finally a well polished VR game.
one_reviews_text: Along with Arizona Sunshine, this is a full VR gaming experiance that will leave you wanting more! Excellent graphics, sound and gameplay make this a very imersive game that will hopefully receive some DLC in the near future.
Insanely good. This is a AAA game and the price tag of $0 is astonishing. Thank you, Oculus :)

review_title: It's good, you should play it
one_reviews_text: An actual review should be placed here
would like to see gears of war in something similar,

This game is by far, very far, the best experience on the Oculus right now. For nvidia 970 users, don t mind pushing the graphics higher, your card will allow it up to a decent level, and the game is all the more enjoyable

one_reviews_text: I AM NOT EXCITED!!! CAN YOU TELL?!

review_title: Amazing Game, Time Crisis on Crack in VR

And get a better movement, like a 360ª style. And not having to face all the time the same way.

GUYS the mods work great. All you have to do is go on to the mod site and download mod. It will automaticly install, then go into the game,go to mods and there you have it. Very easy to do trust me...........

Simply AWESOME!  You won't be disapointed.

review_title: AAA title and lives up to the hype.

review_title: Robo Recall free as I recall
one_reviews_text: Very confortable game is alot of fun to play. Graphics are pleasent on the eyes and gameplay is just what I wanted ever since I had to sit through I Robot, giving me uncontrolable urge to destroy some machines.

review_title: One of the best VR games available!
one_reviews_text:
First off, the only reason i haven't given this a 5 star is due to needing more content, would also be nice to see some other enviroments other than city based one's, that being said, all other games i would have to rate at 3 or less stars :P
Hat tipped to Epic for creating such a wonderful game, and really looking forwards to seeing some epic mods, hopefuly in the very near future.
The only game that comes close in regards to shooters would be RawData, but since owning Robo Recall, Raw data has been left on the shelf ;)
If wanting to have the best shooter available, then imo this is it!
Also played this on the HTC vive, and tbh have not had any issues what so ever!
Still reading? your wasting valuable time when you could be having fun, buy now!
SIMPLY THE BEST VR GAME TO THIS DATE!!  This is the way it's supposed to be done!

The developers have nailed how incredible VR can be for first person games and games in general. The music captures the 80s vibe perfectly and everything is just really well polished. Could not recommend it enough.

Love it! I can't believe this game was actually free!

Absolute AAA result!

The guns, catching of projectiles, and ripping of robots all feel fantastic. If it wasn't for the real world this would be all I do.

review_title: This was why i sold my vive

Diving, ducking, reloading... such an amazing experience. Using via revive (one of the few to actually buy this game!!!) Its incredible.  This is the reason I bought VR. No motion sickness what so ever. In Rally, I can find myself in a deep sweat, but 45 mins into a session absolutely no problems. Really fun experience. Really have to be cautious of your surroundings though. chucking stuff in a game is fun, but be wary of the old tv. I cant wait for more to come! pretty much anything built in the unreal engine for VR has been a smash to play. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!

I can't tell you how much I absolutely enjoy this game so far.  My only major complaint is teleporting can feel clunky in a panic.

Otherwise, I love the style and gameplay.  I hope they keep this going with more maps and such.
The porting took a bit to get used to, but the gameplay is great. I really really really like the fighting/gameplay

review_title: best vr game at the moment
one_reviews_text: The graphics are epic, i got a 1070 supersampling to 1.3 and goes smoth all at high, very well optimiced, the inmersion is fantastic, the powers, the movement, like super power, time bullet, all amazing!!!
Title say it all. Nice graphics, but not ground-breaking like some of the other reviews indicate. There's better, cheaper ones available.
